title: NA
review: this system is awesome  the pulleys are smoother than any cable machines at my gym  the handles rope and bar are the same quality as my gym if not better  at first i was attaching the pulleys to my pullup bar but then i picked up some lag type eye bolts and strategically placed them in some studs in the wall and ceiling of my garage and now i have so many configurations i can do almost any workout my gym offers but from homei didnt own any plates at first but i purchased an ankle strap with a plan in mind i have a set of adjustable dumbbells so i was hoisting one of them up and down for a couple days until my plates arrivedi recommend the cap rubber bumper plates i purchased  pounds in various weights for  and im getting moreim about to purchase the sertt lat bar and a vbar to round out this system maybe even a couple more pulleys so i can leave them all in placeyou have to be creative but you can set these pulleys up in so many different ways  if you own this system a set of adjustable dumbbells and a bench you can do a complete workout from home  very happy with the quality and value of this purchase and if you are considering buying something like this i highly recommend it

prod_name: hsertt weight cable pulley system gym
title: wish i ordered this years ago
review: i wish i had ordered this for my home gym years ago the overall quality of this is fantastic i was really surprised doesnt feel cheap at all and set up is super easy i simply hook it up to my pull up bar in the door frame takes about  seconds pile the weights on and go im using standard plates and the loading pin measures about  tall plenty of room to stack a decent amount of weight onfor the last several years ive been using barbells and dumbbells basic stuff but wow its so nice to have access to such a wide range of new exercises nowthe only exercises that dont quite feel right are the cable flyes when the pulleys are attached to a pull up bar and bicep curlswith cable flyes in a gym the pulleys are directly at your sides which creates a constant tension on your chest muscles no matter where your arms are in the range of motion when this set up is attached to your pull up bar at home you have to step forward which moves the pulleys are behind you so once your arms are pointed straight out in front of you the tension is taken off your chest muscles and placed directly onto your shoulders and triceps so at best you get the same stimulation youd get from a dumbbell chest fly with the same limitations of that movementfor bicep curls it just doesnt feel right when the loading pin is attached to the pulley and allowed to glide freely on the cable like they show in the pictures so an easy fix for this is to simply not use the cables load up the loading pin with your weights attach the rope or straight bar to it and do your curls that way no cable needed you get a lot more tension on your biceps that way than if you try to let the pulley glide freely on the cableotherwise all of the tricep shoulder back and ab movements feel fantastic with this set up sertt offers two different options for this set one is a little cheaper and comes with fewer attachments and cables i highly encourage you to spend the extra  on this one for the extra cables attachments and pulley im constantly discovering new exercises to do and i wouldnt be able to do them without the extra equipment that comes with this  optionhighly highly recommend this

prod_name: hsertt weight cable pulley system gym
title: yes you can do lower body exercises
review: i was told that you couldnt do lower body exercises with this system but as i have a power rack i bought an upgraded pulley from amazon that bolts onto my cage and i put it on the side of my rack then i attached one of the straps from this set onto the bottom of the opposite of my rack voila i can do glute kickbacks side leg extensions for inner thighs and ham curls with weights which i could only do with bands before i will be checking out to see what i can figure out for quads the other straps i attached to the top back and front of my rack for when i want to do upper body stuff the chains and extra pulleys are great

prod_name: hsertt weight cable pulley system gym
title: wish i ordered this years ago
review: i wish i had ordered this for my home gym years ago the overall quality of this is fantastic i was really surprised doesnt feel cheap at all and set up is super easy i simply hook it up to my pull up bar in the door frame takes about  seconds pile the weights on and go im using standard plates and the loading pin measures about  tall plenty of room to stack a decent amount of weight onfor the last several years ive been using barbells and dumbbells basic stuff but wow its so nice to have access to such a wide range of new exercises nowthe only exercises that dont quite feel right are the cable flyes when the pulleys are attached to a pull up bar and bicep curlswith cable flyes in a gym the pulleys are directly at your sides which creates a constant tension on your chest muscles no matter where your arms are in the range of motion when this set up is attached to your pull up bar at home you have to step forward which moves the pulleys are behind you so once your arms are pointed straight out in front of you the tension is taken off your chest muscles and placed directly onto your shoulders and triceps so at best you get the same stimulation youd get from a dumbbell chest fly with the same limitations of that movementfor bicep curls it just doesnt feel right when the loading pin is attached to the pulley and allowed to glide freely on the cable like they show in the pictures so an easy fix for this is to simply not use the cables load up the loading pin with your weights attach the rope or straight bar to it and do your curls that way no cable needed you get a lot more tension on your biceps that way than if you try to let the pulley glide freely on the cableotherwise all of the tricep shoulder back and ab movements feel fantastic with this set up sertt offers two different options for this set one is a little cheaper and comes with fewer attachments and cables i highly encourage you to spend the extra  on this one for the extra cables attachments and pulley im constantly discovering new exercises to do and i wouldnt be able to do them without the extra equipment that comes with this  optionhighly highly recommend this

prod_name: hsertt weight cable pulley system gym
title: wish i ordered this years ago
review: i wish i had ordered this for my home gym years ago the overall quality of this is fantastic i was really surprised doesnt feel cheap at all and set up is super easy i simply hook it up to my pull up bar in the door frame takes about  seconds pile the weights on and go im using standard plates and the loading pin measures about  tall plenty of room to stack a decent amount of weight onfor the last several years ive been using barbells and dumbbells basic stuff but wow its so nice to have access to such a wide range of new exercises nowthe only exercises that dont quite feel right are the cable flyes when the pulleys are attached to a pull up bar and bicep curlswith cable flyes in a gym the pulleys are directly at your sides which creates a constant tension on your chest muscles no matter where your arms are in the range of motion when this set up is attached to your pull up bar at home you have to step forward which moves the pulleys are behind you so once your arms are pointed straight out in front of you the tension is taken off your chest muscles and placed directly onto your shoulders and triceps so at best you get the same stimulation youd get from a dumbbell chest fly with the same limitations of that movementfor bicep curls it just doesnt feel right when the loading pin is attached to the pulley and allowed to glide freely on the cable like they show in the pictures so an easy fix for this is to simply not use the cables load up the loading pin with your weights attach the rope or straight bar to it and do your curls that way no cable needed you get a lot more tension on your biceps that way than if you try to let the pulley glide freely on the cableotherwise all of the tricep shoulder back and ab movements feel fantastic with this set up sertt offers two different options for this set one is a little cheaper and comes with fewer attachments and cables i highly encourage you to spend the extra  on this one for the extra cables attachments and pulley im constantly discovering new exercises to do and i wouldnt be able to do them without the extra equipment that comes with this  optionhighly highly recommend this

review: this is the workout tool i didnt know i needed it was such a revelation what more can be done and the kind of gains we are missing out on when not using these grips ive used them as soon as i got them and my forearms got such a pump the grips make it so hard to lift that i had to cut down on my weights significantly on the barbell and dumbbells must have for any serious bodybuilder

prod_name: fat gripz pro
title: NA
review: the fit gripz is precisely what i was after the seller goes way beyond anything i have experienced before not content with just getting the goods to me and also sent precise instructions on how to use them safely additionally they sent links to youtube on correct usage really happy and satisfied with the purchase i will be buying another soon thank you

prod_name: fat gripz pro
title: NA
review: i bought the fat gripz pro and the fat gripz extreme i will review both here because they had pretty surprising use cases for mean important thing to note is that i have quite large hands not freakish but  cm from pinky to thumb and about  cm from middle finger tip to wrist this latter number is important because my hands will comfortably wrap around the fat gripz pro with my fingers and thumbs just touching and honestly i find they can make certain lifts like bench press i know this is not their intended use more comfortable but for when i want to be uncomfortable i use the extremesi remember agonizing over if i should buy the extremes as well as the pros given a lot of reviews by much bigger and stronger folks than me said the extremes were pretty hardcore and you should start with the pros and work your way up i am very enthusiastic about improving my grip in part because i have ulnar nerve damage in both my arms which has weakened my grip for reference my grip fails around kg deadlift so i figured id buy both and work my way up to the extremes in reality i felt pretty comfortable with the extremes straight away and theyre exclusively what i use for gripforearm training while the pros i use for warm ups grip drop sets or for push exercises where i want something comfortable in my palmthe only negative thing i have to say about both the pros and the extremes is that i wish they were longer wider as they are about the same width as my palm so i have to be quite precise with where i place themtldr if you have big hands and are tossing up between the extremes and the pros dont be discouraged by people telling you not to get the extremes straight away theyre slightly smaller than a tin can so if the idea of curling a kg can of baked beans is okay to you then id say just go for it

prod_name: prosource fit dip stand station
title: fantstica relacin calidad precio
review: the prosource fit dip stand station has become an indispensable part of my home gym and its transformed the way i work on my upper body strength and endurance this heavyduty dip bar is designed for tricep dips and more and its proven to be a solid addition to my fitness routinethe build quality is impressive with a sturdy frame that supports my weight without any wobbling or instability the safety connector adds an extra layer of security giving me peace of mind during intense workoutsthe dip station is versatile allowing me to perform a range of exercises that target my triceps chest shoulders and more its like having a mini gym at home which is incredibly convenientthe prosource fit dip stand is easy to assemble and it doesnt take up much space in my home gym area i appreciate the attention to detail in the design such as the foam grips for added comfort during workoutsif youre serious about your fitness and looking to level up your upper body strength training the prosource fit dip stand station is a musthave its a durable and versatile piece of equipment that helps you work towards your fitness goals efficiently and safely

title: awesome

prod_name: prosource fit dip stand station
title: calidad y muy buen precio
review: i wanted to have more home equipment for exercising i ordered dips bar which somehow took almost one month to arrive i would say worst shipping experience i ever had except that when the parcel arrived the box was damaged as you can see from the picture i still kept it because i wanted the product and could not wait another month to get the replacement unfortunately not only box but the product was also partially damaged you can see few pictures of defects which it hadpositive side is that it is really easy to assemble and feels like it can handle the weight i am around  kg and used the bar few times already and had no issues so farif you are lucky and get proper shipping then it worth the money

prod_name: prosource fit dip stand station
title: overall pretty good
review: if id had this dip station as a kid i wouldnt have broken my arm from enthusiastically swinging between the backs of the dining room chairs and the back of the couch like a tiny hyperactive monkey after schoolneedless to say im an adult now kind of and learned my lesson well about the questionable stability of dining chairs for the sake of acrobatics back theni bought the lite dipping station version despite the listed weight capacity of up to lbs i wasnt sure if this would be sturdy enough to handle my heavy body weight so i really hestitated between this one and other ones but ive had it for about  months now its still trucking same as it did on day onethis is a good one it doesnt adjust updown like some stations but instead is basically two heavy duty bars connected to the bottom parts i think thats what makes it so solid its very few pieces and a lot of good heavy soldering where they connect im glad i got this one instead of the kind that might adjust down on me unexpectedly while im using it its weird that an item named lite seems better to me than one named pro but whatever theyre completely different styles and this ones a way better design for what i wanted and was looking for nice and solid no up and down adjustables relying on little pins just solidthe dipping bars were pretty easy to put together and came with the only tool it needed for putting in the screws it was easier than putting together a metal bedframe it took maybe  minutes including reading the directions you just have to pay attention to where the holes are on the lower part like where the connecting bar goes between the two otherwise itll take an extra minute as you flip itthe connecting bar keeps the two dipping bars from skidding on smooth flooring so id recommend putting it on especially if youre a heavier weight even though its not necessarily needed it keeps the bars together so you dont have to worry about it slidingthe cushion handles on the station are actually comfortable no weird smell or any stickiness from them although its gotten hot this summer i didnt know at first if id like them but theyre good and so far have been very durablegetting it has made it so much easier for me to do a little exercise more frequently without the exhaustion of setting up anything or planning to exercise or the pressure of doing it for a set period of time once its put togther theres nothing to adjust prep or set up its just there you can do it as you walk from your room to whereever or back or not and it takes literally no extra mental or physical effort or good intentions or planning you either do or you dont because its right there and on the way stick it in front of a doorway and its great its accessible you dont have to take it out or put it away and it barely takes any space unlike my slant bench that doesnt quite fit the room when set up that i have to pull out to even use and takes up a bunch of horizontal real estate i could usethere are some things that when you buy them they help you with your life and this has been one of them so thanks company you did a good job and its appreciated i needed it

prod_name: prosource fit dip stand station
title: pleased solid design good investment
review: love it i read all the reviews before purchasing and although most of the reviews were great the odd one got me doubting whether this was a solid product or not now that i have received it and put it together i love it take your time putting it together and hand tighten it lossley until you can line it up on the floor and make sure everything is squared before final tightening with the allen wrench then put the safety bar in it moves a little when weight is not on it but is totally solid when you put body weight on it the vid in the review that shows a bolt not tightening youll notice he hasnt put the safety bar in which has the thread that will actually make it tighten so no worries on that if youre a super big guy wanting to do handstands on the fully extended height be aware that you are probably pushing it to the max and if youre surprised it is not the most stable well duh im a  female and before i attempt to do a handstand on these bars four feet in the air i might attache some straps to provide more stability just in case which is just a good fail safe unless you have perfect balance if i wanted to do a handstand and be wobbly af i would simply take off the exterior rubber caps to the feet and add an additional steel pipe which i appreciate is easy to do and id put it up against a wall if i was afraid of tipping forward or backward in my opinion this is a solid design that you could further adapt if you wanted to push the parameters of its capacity bad reviews are the product may have a manufacturer defect  it can happen but most likely people not knowing how to put it together right probably due to using the allen wrench right off the bat which could cause the parts to tighten on uneven threads and make it wobbly so many options to choose from or spend more money on i got mine and was totally pleased that i chose this one relieved

prod_name: sunny health & fitness twisting stair stepper machine
title: amazing product
review: antes de comprar el aparato he leido miles de reseas de esta y otras maquinas parecidas mi conclusion despues de  meses es el siguientees una maquina que funciona con dos hidraulicos lo cual significa que estos tienen una vida util diferente al resto de la maquina pero estos pueden ser reparados o remplazados aunque por el pequeo precio que tiene la maquina en si no creo que valga la pena para que estos hidraulicos funcionen bien y tengan una vida util larga es importante mantenerlos bien lo mas importante es evitar que estos lleguen a calentarse mucho o esten en funcionamiento mucho tiempo a una temperatura alta por dentro tienen un aceite especial que es la que se calienta y pierde sus propiedades la mejor forma para que no se caliente es o utilizarlos en tramos cortos de unos  min y dejarlos enfriar o utilizar un sistema de enfriamiento para que no se caliente tanto un sistema simple consistiria en un ventilador a la altura del suelo o ventilacion cruzada ya sea cerca de una puerta al exterior o aire acondicionado en la estancia en invierno o en un clima frio seria suficiente para que no se calentara tanto aun asi sienpre es mejor usarlos periodos cortos  o  min y dejar que se enfrie si dejamos que se caliente mucho y lo hacemos de forma prolongada lo que sucedera es que el haceide pierda sus propiedades mas rapido de lo normal y el hidraulio deje de funcionar estos consejos es para que dure mas tiempo de ll que puede durar sin mantenimiento que ya es vastante calculo que usandola cada dia  min su vida seria de  aos como muchoteniendo en cuenta lo anterior evitaremos que nos salgan ruidos antes de lo normaly una vez dicho esto sobre la maquina para hacer ejercicios es muy buena es una maquina muy basica y muy funcional simula que subamos escalones de echo notaremos presion en los musculos por encima de las rodillas tal cual como cuando subimos escaleras de forma continuada un ejercicio por cierto muy completo ya que si se ejecuta bien se ejercita casi todo el cuerpohe leido comentarios de que hay a personas  que no se les suve el nivel de pulsaciones pues me cuesta mucho creer que sea asi yo cuando llevo mas de  minutos noto que me cuesta respirar y que mi corazon aumenta sus latidossoy una prueba de que la maquina quema calorias pues a  calorias a lo largo de dia que uso la maquina en este periodo he perdido vasta te peso claro esta que intentando comer sano pero no deja de ser una maquina que puede remplazar una caminarala maquina a los meses empieza a hacer ruido de sus hidraulicos pero no es muy molestoos ni nada malo es algo normal no deja de ser una maquina con un sistema mecanico como el resto de maquinas que tambien lo hacen ya sea bicicletas cintas etcsi quieres perder peso y o hacer ejercicio en casa esta es una maquina calidad precio efectiva

prod_name: sunny health & fitness twisting stair stepper machine
title: im pleasantly surprised
review: originally i was browsing for a treadmill but i really wanted something that would develop stronger muscles for walking uphill or step climbing a few months ago i walked the length of the grand canyon  rim to rim and i want to stay in shape for the next trip when i read the reviews for this piece of equipment i was still slightly undecided about it but i chose to take the riskive only had it for three days i am    lbs and  years oldi had no problems putting it together the base comes already assembled the only assembly needed is with the vertical upright i was very careful with the assembly instructions and it took about  minutes to set up but i went very slow the equipment is made in china imagine that so the instructions lack proper english but theyre manageable the front of the base has a knob that will adjust the tension the stepper makes very little noise its hardly noticeablethe base is approximately  by also theres nothing to plug inbefore ordering i thought that the handle would be too low for me but its the perfect height i have mine set at optimum height same as in the picture in the adinitially i only took about  steps and i was already breathing hard so i got some rest i felt that my leg muscles were receiving the exercise that i was looking for three days later im doing  steps and then stopping the air cylinders get pretty warm i check the stepper every time i get off of it looking for damage or anything loose so far everything is fineive also discovered an added bonus i can place my hands on the bottom horizontal part of the handle grip tighly and slightly lean forward while stepping as i take the steps i slightly push up on my upper body with my arms causing my biceps triceps and chest muscles to also get a workout along with my legs i just have to be careful not to lean forward too much so i wont fall frontwards so be very careful with thisas mentioned above ive only had this equipment for three days but so far i am pleasantly surprised turns out that it was exactly what i wanted and the price is very reasonableupdate ive had this stepper for almost  weeks i have worked up to  steps a day however when i get near  steps it begins to squeal ive used different lubricating sprays but the noise is still annoying i finally found something that works i place a small fan on the floor directly in front of the red tension knob of the stepper this cools down the bottom area and that eliminates the noiseim still satisfied with the purchase

prod_name: sunny health & fitness twisting stair stepper machine
title: works well and easy to put together
review: assembly of this is not as difficult as putting together an ikea product and they give you all the components to do so  i was hesitant to buy after reading some of the reviews of the stepper failing after a few months if it does i will update the review but its been a week and it works well  one caveat if you are a canadian customer you arent covered by the warranty  the main handlebar and adjustment knob did not thread together so i contacted sunny customer support via email  they always responded within  to  hours  they shipped me replacement parts for free but i did have to pay for shipping  that was  cad  however they told me that amazon would likely cover that cost within  days of original purchase date  i contacted amazon support by phone and they did refund me back on my original form of payment the shipping cost without needing the invoice  but you only have  days to do that  even though two of the parts did not fit together handlebars i could use the machine until the replacement was sent and it was an easy process to do it  it would not deter me from buying another sunny product in the future overall im happy with the purchase

prod_name: sunny health & fitness twisting stair stepper machine
title: great little machine with one small challenge
review: i love this stepper  the one complaint and it is really just a precaution  if you are weak or perhaps elderly do not depend on leaning on the handlebars to get on the machine  get one foot on first then the handlebars will help you mount the machine otherwise it easily tilts and could throw you to the floor  it is small compact easy to move and gives me a great workout  i have a cubii can i say that and enjoy using it to keep my circulation strong but it did nothing to help me build strength in my thighs to navigate stairs  perhaps they could add some weight on the front of the machine to counterbalance it but then it wouldnt be as easy to move around  id buy it again  so many people dont understand how important it is as you age to keep the thigh muscles strong enough to lift you out of chairs climb stairs etc  having to pull or push yourself up a flight of stairs or out of a recliner with armshoulder muscles alone is asking for trouble  too easy to break or dislocate something  then what are you going to do

title: simple and awesome
review: the pandemic taught me how to get a good workout at home and even now that were out of it the habit remains this pull up bar is surprisingly durable and supports my weight without a problem lb and it allows me to get some back work in whenever i want i use only the parallel grips as the regular grip is a little too narrow for my shoulder width but thats what i prefer anyhow and i have no concerns about them breakingi will say it may be beneficial to put a tennis ball or something protective on each end of the bar that presses against the door frame and it is starting to leave a visible indentation but that is also variable depending on the weight of the person using the bar and how hard it presses into the frame

title: a few adjustments as it did not fit the door frame
review: seems sturdy easy to assemble tad there are  screws and it comes with a wrench and the metal tubes are pretty solid when assembled it was too wide for the door way i took off the rubber end caps and cut off  inches off each side and then put the rubber caps on again fits perfectly i also wanted it higher so on the backside of the door frame i secured a piece of wood that boosts the bar up about  inches this will also help with the weight im lbs on the moulding around the door the only thing that puzzles me is that everything is metal but the bar that rests horizontally on the back of the door frame its plastic seems somewhat durable but i wonder if that will be the thing that might break we will seeupdate  weeks later solid and functional ive done about  chin upspull ups on it and it flexes but it is sturdy and solid the foam pads have ripped a bit but i just use hockey tape and wrap the handles no other issues great purchase

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: mine came a little scuffed
review: mine was slated to come in  weeks but arrived only about  week after not a deal breaker but when it finally arrived the package was crumpled the bubble wrap was browning and the ziploc containing the screws was completely ripped the tiny washers basically dropped out asap and i almost lost them foam was already dented in some areas harmless but looks bad then during assembly i found out that the bottom screws were perfect but the top ones had too much leeway even with the given washersi fixed it by putting extra mm washers to tighten the top area as pictured unfortunately my door frame didnt suit the design of the bar and it hangs awkwardly at a  degree angle somewhat dangerously  at least its still usable because of the horizontal bar being shorter than the doorway nd picas for the positives the metal is pretty sturdy cushioning is just ok my packaging looked like ancient warehouse goods but the product itself is fine ideally you want your door frame to hang about cm off a wall to get the bar to stand straight as intended but even if it doesnt like mine it can still be used just exercise caution and dont swing on ittldr product seems fine but delivery and condition leaves some to be desired chances are i got a warehouse leftover

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: sturdy strong and consistent
review: i bought this product  years ago ive used it almost every day since its worked great and has come along with me on my body building journey ever since the build quality is great the grips have remained comfortable and everything about the bar is greathowever the metal holder for the bar hasnt been able to stand the test of time very well its gotten a lot of bend on it and just this morning i had it finally bend too far on meis it possible to get just the metal bit ive loved this bar forever and i dont need a new one but i do need a new holderoverall  after  years of everyday use the metal piece will eventually give out the bar itself

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: extremely easy to take down and put up
review: the item was delivered without any additional boxes so everyone who saw the the box knew it was a workout bar it took  minutes  minutes max to set the bar up and put onto the door so far there is no damage on the door and it is super easy to set up and take down my husband is  lbs and im  lbs and both of us use the bar we have toddlers running around the home so we constantly need the doors closed which means we take the bar down daily and put it back up at night when they are sleeping it is super easy to take on and off im super happy we bought it the only con to the bar is how bulky it is since we live in a small space and we constantly need the doors closed during the daytime aside from that i would  recommend the product

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: geniale alternative zu klemmtrrecks
review: in meiner alten wohnung hatte ich ein trreck welches man zwischen den trrahmen verkeilt die gumminoppen haben abgefrbt und die stetige spannung ihre spuren am rahmen hinterlassen auerdem hat das trreck doch auf dauer auch gestrtder iron gym ist eine geniale alternative sofern man einen trrahmen im haus hat dessen mae passen meiner hat eine tiefe von  cm das gewicht hngt so allerdings schon an den rundstangen der plastikteil liegt nicht mehr auf der wand auf dennoch hlt es mein gewicht von  kg ohne probleme also erst ausmessen dann bestellenlieferung wie immer top und zgig durch amazonverpackung alle einzelteile sind sicher in schaumstoff verpackt kleinteile getrennt im lieferumfang enthalten sind der iron gym bestehend aus  stangen plus der plastikschaumstoff auflage ein kleiner ernhtungs und trainingsratgeber ein sicherheitskeil und die sicherheitsbefestigung letztere sind beide optional und verhindern dass der iron gym sich beim training aushngt der keil wird einfach in den trrahmen gesteckt die befestigung wird mit dbeln in der wand verankert doch wie gesagt beides optional ich trainiere ohnequalitt ich war berrascht wie robust die konstruktion wirkt die schaumstoffpolster halten einiges aus die metallstangen sind allesamt solide und ohne scharfe kanten die montage ist eine sache von sekunden  statt dem beigepackten schlssel wrde ich fr die schrauben aber eigenes werkzeug empfehlen die schrauben jedoch nicht zu fest ziehenhandling klimmzge mssen natrlich mit angewinkelten beinen durchgefhrt werden die griffe sind angenehm und rutschfest  griffstellungen sind mglich auch fr liegesttze  griffmglichkeiten und situps ist das gert klasse fr dips ist ein stuhl praktischer als dieses gert da zu tiefmeine volle kaufempfehlung sollte sich auf lange zeit meine meinung zum iron gym ndern werde ich die rezession natrlich dementsprechend aktualisieren

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: good addition to an iron gym especially if you like velcro
review: bought to use with my iron gym duh so that i could do hanging ab exercises  they do work well enough but i sometimes question if they will hold me the closures on them are velcro  and while the contact area for the velcro pads is substantial i still hesitated at first to put my full weight on them  that said they do hold im about lbs and dont seem to be straining at all but ill knock off half a start for using velcro over a different hanging solution not to mention the ripping sound of parting that much velcro when you remove themthey do enable me to do the hanging ab crunches i purchased them for but not the oblique movements  this is not due to a fault in the product itself per se but more just a fact of how it works  since youre hanging under the iron gym youre in the middle of a door frame  this means that side to side movements will be limited by the width of the door frame itself  so half a star lost herestill overall a good product if you already own the iron gym or similar and want to expand your use of it

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: very few flawswell built
review: i purchased this for my twelve year old daughter who wanted to strengthen her arms therefore i never planned on doing any heavyduty workouts with it or such so i cant properly rate it in regards to range of motion as i have no experience in that department but it seems to be sturdy enough for dips pushups etc from what i can tell in regards to the setup the instructions were a bit confusing but there are many youtube videos online easily guiding you through the process so that was no problemeverything was very well packaged and nothing was damagedeverything was in bags that were indicatednow in regards to the sturdiness ill be honest at first i was a bit worried that it would fall we hung it on my daughters doorframe so it would be a pullup bar after pulling on it quite a few times to test the durability we tried it i believe the weight limit is something around lbs or so i feel as if this bar would be sturdy enough but i am not positivelast two thingsthe only big flaw i noticed was that since we hung ours on the doorframe we must be really careful to not push up when  when doing pullups as that would cause it to fall from the doorframe and for the person to injure themselves lastly i read some reviews mentioning that the individuals doorframe began to bend and the bar caused problems in the doorframe since i havent had it very long and since the primary user of the bar is only around  lbs i havent seen any issues in the doorframe but only time will telloverall i recommend this bar for recreational purposes and just to get a good workout in at home it serves our purpose and is very helpful

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: an unnecessary addition
review: i bought a bar and was thinking to also add this item to complete the set but i am afraid to say that the original bar ab workout band were better than this extra ones so did not make it a great use

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: zufrieden
review: iron gym total ab workout bauchgurte sehr gut fr meine bauchmuskeln und meine ausbildung ich bin froh dass ich gekauft

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: artculo  excelente
review: excelente

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: jaime mais
review: quand mme un peu du le montage les tractions tout va bien mais cest un produit tudi pour le porte amricaine premirement il ne tient pas sur mes portes jai dus fixer des crochets dans mon mur parce que le malheureux petit crochet livr avec lappareil a tenu  secondes deuximement la barre de traction et trop longue par rapport  mes portes standards je nai pas la place pour poser mes mains sur la mousse si jai gard le produit cest uniquement  cause de son prix attractif et du fait que je ne voulez pas une simple barre

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: rapporto qualit prezzo
review: ottimo rapporto qualit prezzo per questo oggetto semplice ma robusto ideale per la palestra e per chi si allena a casa spedizione nei termini come al solito

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: i am very happy with this purchase
review: i was planning on buying ab straps that cost about  times the cost of these but figured i would take a chance and i am glad i did  the straps are held together with velcro so they are easily adjustable and can be used on a power rack without any issues  at first i was afraid that the velcro wouldnt support my weight but it did and it is very strong  the straps do have a small amount of padding in the so they are comfortable and dont really dig into your arms like some straps that i have used in the past  overall i think that they are well worth the price so just buy them already  i hope this helps you make your decision

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: kleines fitnesscenter fr zuhause
review: habe lange gesucht nach einem model was fr meine tr passt  cm breit  cm dick gipskartondie beschreibung stimmt wand hlt belastung aus diverse bungen sind mglich zb  varianten von klimmzgenbitte beschreibung lesenaufbau ging schnell  min da intuitiv mglich alle teile auch notwendiges werkzeug lagen beider schaumstoff schtzt die zarge habe noch keine schden im trbereich feststellen knnenschnell mal ein paar bungen einwerfen  nun kein problem mehrnegativdurch die hhe der stange hngt man tief beine sind anzuwinkeln

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: excellent with some strengthening of the door frame
review: most likely be prepared to strengthen the top of your door frame attached is what i did wood bar screwed in the x with  crews of  each i also put  steel plates diy so the exercise bar does not fail if you touch it by accident this makes it semipermanent and i can remove it in seconds if needed i am  lbs and it does not move at all so unless you believe blue elephants exist this is a perfect exercise tool with some need of thinking and diy capabilities with detailed review and pics please understand i will not reply to questions enjoy

prod_name: iron gym pull up bars
title: not iron gym
review: i had read the reviews before so i knew that the product was a fake surprisingly the product wasnt as bad as reviewed it is a door gym not and iron gym also i think the items are second hand due to poor conditions  i think the seller should be more honest about the product they are selling as it is deceptionthe item was poorly packaged just in a large jiffy bag and the main box was also damagedit did arrive before estimated date the item smells and feels new just a knockoff version however the damaged instructions suggest the product maybe second hand some reviews have reported having difficulty fitting the door gym together i didnt have this problem all screws were present and fit the frame justthe item fits inside my door frame and hold my weight the pads are comfortable one is a bit loose and i feel safe using the product  the main bar may prove to be weak as it is in two sections with nothing not even a clips inside the bars holding them together so your weight is resting on the plastic bar at the top however this is nothing a bit of duck tape cant strengthen   box and instructions damaged but efficient selleryes the seller lied deceived and has used fake pictures of the item hey are selling something you expect from ebay not amazon  the material is cheaper than the iron gym but as you are only a few feet from the ground i cant see any health risks also it costs just over  what do you expect if you want amazing quality good then your going to have to pay top prices there is a reason gyms charge high monthly rates and it is because their equipment is expensive im afraid there is not such thing as a bargain anymore only expensive imitation and copy cat productsit suited my needs as it will not be over used but if you are a heavy malefemale or intend to use this product intensely i suggest you purchase the real thing

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: very good
review: the resistance bands are quite long so you cant achieve resistance in the full range of movements that are illustrated on the workout sheet included  the individual bands are also very light  even using all of them together its a light workout so great for high rep exercise or slow tempo work but not if youre looking to increase muscle mass  all in all a good piece of equipment great for beginners but it has limited application and not recommended if you are already in good shape and looking to be challenged

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: price vs quality
review: getting older now and i needed to transition to something more portable than an established gym setupfirst time trying this after initially bagging out on it lol that said i must say that i am very impressed with it and i can take it anywhere with mesome people complain about not having enough tension bands but i say just buy some more they are cheap enough and can be purchased on their own

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: very strong and durable
review: it was all i expected

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: a great idea
review: im so surprised because for how much i paid for this setup i thought it wouldnt be this nice of quality everything you need is in this boxi wish the examples told you what they were usingbut other then that i  recommend it

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: solid good quality set for a portable gym
review: easy to set and use good for people on the go like me traveling truck driver will give a good workout because of its strong resistance bands material is built well have had no issues to this day i ended up buying another one for more resistance and works better for me good bang for your buck highly recommend

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: decent product but not for people under
review: this was in my opinion a great set for the prime day price with which  i bought it the bar fits together perfectly and it isnt too heavy but substantial enough i dont know how well the rings on each end will hold up because theyre fastened onto the bars ends not screwed in as i expected the quality of all the components seems finemy one comment is that the included straps are waaay too heavy for me to use the product description was pretty much accurate so i cannot say i was surprised i was really hoping that this company would also offer different strengths of straps for purchase separately or that a product would exist that otherwise fills this void however there isnt much at this timestill this set is an excellent idea im getting lighter straps that hopefully will fit and if the lb straps that are included are fine for you this is an excellent way to try out this form of strength training for yourself particularly for prime day this was an excellent value

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great quality for the price
review: i like the quality of the bar and the option to use  or  pieces the bands have nice resistance with  bands included the quality of the whole set is good with a workout chart included my only con is shorter bands are not include for rowing excersize there is not enough resistance with the included bands

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: a more affordable and great alternative to redge fit
review: this product looks great on paper but im thinking of returning it while i canits looks really well made and sturdy and i bet it would last over a decade but here is the problem im for most of the exercises that require the door frame theres no problem but a lot of the exercises i can crank out  reps with all  bands and im not a muscular guy by any meansmy recommendation to the seller add shorter bands for your shorter clients or at least offer them

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: NA
review: great quality a good price im happy with the product

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: NA
review: this home gym is much more than i expected the bar is very robust amd seems to hold up to the instense resistance put on it between you and the bands i really appreciate the fact that the bands are covered by the nylon sleeves because like most men i have body hair and theres nothing more uncomfortable than bare latex or rubber bands rubbing against your body and pulling your friggin hair its what has kept me from using the other band systems ive owned in the past but the innocedar bands are a huge relief and was the major reason i chose this system over the redge fit one the piece bar is another reason because its wide enough to beused comfortably for men with wide shoulders and the price was the final deciding factor with a good amount of resistance the bands are great for people just getting into band fitness or those who are trying to get back into shape after years of not hitting the gym like yours truly and seeking a lowimpact solution when time has caught up your joints the redge fit system seems to be an okay product but for the price youre getting more with the innocedar redge fit does offer their app but you can easily find great band workout vids and channels on youtube for free but ive only been using this for a short time ill post a update if anything changes

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: solid
review: good solid set best price i seen for these his one is good quality

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: incredible
review: little gym at home

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great at home equipment
review: im needing something simple yet effective for at home workouts this set is perfect for me  i like that i have the ability to increase weight by adding straps and the included workout pictures help me put together a routine this is getting me back in the groove of exercising without having to join a gym

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: solid product for home gym or for travel
review: got this package yesterday and completed my first workout last night more importantly i knocked out a  minute workout during my lunch break easy to use and comes with pictures and workout details

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: very nice
review: i love that the bar for the stretch bands can be used in two different lengths  plus all the stretch bands have the same stretch capacity of  bounds  the set is well crafted  it is easy to change and add all of the attachments  the two foot pedals are definitely a plus to have with this set  once your feet are in the pedal straps they dont slip out while doing your stretch routine  i am extremely pleased with my purchase  this is an outstanding movable gym that you can travel where ever you go that has a door to anchor the resistance bands  this movable gym takes up minimal space in your suitcase and or in your home  the cost was reasonable

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: not great for leg work
review: this product is great for upper body workouts but for lower body exercises such as deadlifts and squats there is not enough tension unless you like  tall lol for chest press lat pulldowns seated row triceps biceps and shoulders  and even ab work the band system works great

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: quality made
review: i tried a few of these portable gyms and this was by far the best designed and best made highly recommend plus it comes with a display showing about  different ways to use it

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: best bands ive tried
review: while waiting forever  months for my torrobands to arrive i ordered these much less expensive included a bar and more accessories plus much more versatile plus they arrived within three days of ordering best bands system on the market im a cpt and im setting up an adjustable wall track system so i wont need a door and these are perfect for that after a complaint to the bbb my torrobands arrived the next day comparing the two these are much better sleeve coated and durable a much much better buy

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: nice
review: nice device with different workout optionsone thing however is that it would be nice to have different length of tension cordssmaller options would be nice for different workouts and for different human height

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: same results as gym
review: id been going to the gym x a week for years but life changed and it was going to be harder to get there regularly so i bought these  weeks in and im in just as good of if not better shape than when i was going to the gymjust because of how resistance bands function though youll need a door or buy some wall mounts which is what i did to anchor the bands too though in order to get a high level of resistance for maximum results

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: add shorter rope into the mix
review: while i enjoyed the product it is surprising that all the elastic rope were the same length this does not work for shorter members of the family  no tension at all if you are below   height

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great set
review: this was a great set for the money its very versatile and does everything i needed it to do my only criticism is the strong chemical smell on the handgrips im hoping that the smell subsides with time  i would definitely recommend this to be added to your home gym equipment

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: caution
review: workout equipment is not as easy to use as the description implies length of cords are not easy to match with with desired length just a complete mess and would not recommend

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: higher quality than expected
review: had a couple weeks happily surprised by the quality of the  piece bar with actual steel bits figured it would be all poly bc of the price  the extras included to me it does feel as strong and light as the bar at the gym i am someone who sweats quite a bit so i do not usually use bars with padding bc of grip issues but the padding on this bar is very stable and does not get slippery nor sponge wet

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great product
review: this is great my suggestions are to include more bands so the difference between  band and two isnt a  pound difference  also include a carry bag to hold all the stuff otherwise its perfect

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great product
review: a lot of people will say you get what you pay for well this is wrong  this is a perfect workout tool  love this thing

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: portable
review: i like it  i can take it almost any where i go

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: resistance bands dont produce nearly the force advertised
review: the resistance bands dont give anywhere near the advertised resistanceim  and a lb band gives around lb of weight when tested with a luggage scale stretched out from foot to fully extended arm lb when at a bicep curl distancei expected to get lbs of resistance when using all  bands but with these numbers its gonna be more like lbresistance band issue aside the package arrived damaged and looked like it was previously opened and the items just thrown back in the box the outer amazon box itself was undamaged and unopenedthe bar itself looks and feels good nice and sturdy the outer material feels comfortable to grip if the resistance bands were the advertised weight it might be worth  stars

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: seems good
review: has worked out good for me since the workout items were delivered  will it hold up  cant answer that right now

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: great value for what you get
review: have a personal training business we often order kits our clients can take home to mimic some of the exercises done in our gym  this set comes with plenty decent bands and all the attachments you could want  i like how they got thicker door stoppers so it is less likely to damage doors also the footshoe attachments are great for my clients who may otherwise have disabilities making it difficult to use a traditional ankle strap

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: doesnt screw all the way together
review: its a great value however i received a faulty part i cant screw the end piece on any further than whats shown this faulty end looks different than the other side that screwed in easily

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: the bands are too long
review: i like everything but im  and the bands are to long for some of the exercises if you could adjust them it would be a lot better

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: bar problems with product
review: i just purchased the product and so far im enjoying the system the one flaw is the bar has a problem with the screw together system one side does not work as the screw side is to small to thread and the other side will screw in but is not holding so beware of this problem

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: nice
review: first workout and it kicked my butt well worth the money

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: fine
review: good

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: bar is heavy and perfect length for a wide guy like myself
review: i very impressed about the weight and length of the resistance bar im a fairly wide man and i can get a firm over my shoulders gripgreat choice plus the bands are well made and have a good resistance complete  stars

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: its a real workout
review: its as advertised ive been using it almost every morning the only thing i wished it had is a video showing all the exercises its great for the mature person like myself thats trying to get active again

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: missing the middle bar
review: would have been a great review if all the pieces were there

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: full body workout
review: im about ft in and the bands are a little long but when i cross them they worked id suggest if anything  sending different size bands also you have to use all  bars or none at all you cant make it so you use  or  bars this would be incredibly effective but when used properly this thi g whoops my butt if youre under ft in you may struggle to get resistance

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: good kit bungees are very short
review: good kit bungees are very short

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: quality issue with bar
review: i received my order today everything looks good except the eyes on the ends of the bars they are super loose they wiggle push in and out and im sure if i applied enough pressure to them they would snap i tried spinning them in hoping they would tighten inside but no lucki honestly do not feel comfortable using the bar im sure those metal clips wouldnt feel too good with the snapback resistanceif there is anyway i could get a good replacement bar sent out i may just keep it otherwise i will be sending it back for a refund unfortunately everything else seems to be good quality its just the eye hooks at both sides of the bar

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: a great value for the money
review: this is exceptionally well made great portable gym for a low cost i will order another one so as to increase the weight bands for exercises such as squats

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: i like it
review: good workout easy to assemble and lots of tension

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: poor quality
review: ive been using it regularly for  months now why the poor rating i have to be careful when using it the clasps come loose from the bar and rebound at high speeds this has happened over a dozen times its happened so often with one band that ive marked it i would stop using the band if i didnt need all of the bands for a solid workout also you cant do all of the exercises as displayed in the chart there just isnt enough resistance for example if you try to do the row exercise there is still slack on the bands i have workaround but if they show an exercise i shouldnt have to figure out an alternative ive tried to contact this company and amazon about getting replacements but all i hear are crickets

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: excelente
review: de muy buena calidad

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands

review: i gave  stars because of the band the band dont feel right it doesnt have enough elasticity and it should have different strengthweight other than that the idea is great and the rest of the equipment is excellent

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands
title: its totally a complete compact gym and im loving it
review: so far i like everything with the sturdiness and the flexibility it really gets all body parts a workout definitely a great value for the money

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands

prod_name: innocedar home gym bar kit with resistance bands

review: bar and accessories seem fine but the bands far too long and dont provide enough resistance i will have to order larger bands or more of these i should have just spent the extra money on a better kit

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: perfect for beginners
review: i love this i got in shape in no time its not cheaply made its awesome

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: so many additional pieces
review: theres pretty much nothing you cant do with this product there is a ton of additional pieces and pop ins and add ins it was really a great buy and adorably pink also comes with nylon pink bag to hold accessories together

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: its decent
review: the plastic doesnt feel as sturdy as i would hope and i feel like it could snap in half with enough pressure applied it doesnt slip on the wood flooring so thats a plus some of the slots were really hard to fit the handles into and the extras are just ok but i would use my own straps to be safe especially the resistance bands

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: quality
review: the board has a lot of functions but it does slide

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: great
review: super easy to set up and put away i use it in my home office and it doesnt take up much space i can do a multitude of workouts and then put everything away neatly

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: great workout
review: i purchased the pushup board as a birthday gift for my friend and she absolutely loves it she uses it to have a great workout right at home without having to go to the gym the board is easy to fold and comes in a simple packaging that all fits in the included duffle bag  great for on the go as well

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: great quality
review: bought this for my wife quality is good highly recommend

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: all in
review: love this set all equipment you needed to use while working out at home and very affordable i never thought that i will have this in one purchase i love using this set and it also comes with a bag to put everything and you can bring it anywhere you want to workout

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: nice workout set
review: i like this workout kit pink is super cute i got this becuse i want to excise my shoulders arms abs abdominal musclesso i do not have to go gym three time a week  i can just stay home and work out any time i want  this set is easy to use and easy to store the quality is better than i expected i carry the board and bands with me when i send my daughter to dance class  so i can workout in waiting room while i am waiting for my daughter  i do enjoy it so much

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: amazing buy
review: great buy and able to use when wanting to work out at home and not the gym

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: easy for beginners
review: i like that it so sturdy and wasy to use even when i havent done any exercise in a few years  my health has put it on very slow stenosis puts your bones and mussels  on hold and everything hurts especially in the mornings  but this system is gonna do the trick for me i believe  thankyou for your help and support

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: polyvalent
review: i bought it for my pregnant daughter shes into fitness she love it very polyvalent can do  lot of her exercise while pregnant and after

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: questionably sturdy
review: although im supposed to use the board for pushups it seems as if the middle will cave in otherwise the features are as described the instructions are oddly vague

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: so easy to use
review: this set is so easy to use and you break a good sweat definitely worth the money i use it every single day  love how you can adjust the push up board to workout specific muscles amazing

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: fits my expectation perfectly
review: this fits my expectation perfectly everything looks exactly the same as whats in the picture even provided a training guide labeling which muscles are being practiced with which instruments now i definitely dont have an excuse to not work out since i got all these things at home cant wait to start exercising

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: happy
review: exactly what i was looking for happy to far very sturdy and easy to use

prod_name: lalahigh push up board
title: great value set
review: this set comes with so many items for a great price everything that came in the set was high quality and super cute as well the pushup board is cool and a good way to get some more variety in athome workouts

prod_name: resistance bands set of 5 with handle strength exercise resistance band
title: ottimo prodotto per lallenamento domestico
review: ho acquistato questo set di elastici per aumentare sia di numero che di intensit gli esercizi che si possono fare in un ambiente domestico e le aspettative non sono state traditeil numero di esercizi che si possono fare con questo attrezzo  praticamente illimitato proprio per questo motivo richiede un minimo di programmazione sia per il tipo di esercizio che per il numero di elastici da usare in modo tale da non perdere tempo durante lattivit fisica ma una volta trovati gli esercizi che si vogliono fare e trovato il numero giusto di elastici fa il suo lavoro un aspetto negativo ma intrinseco nella natura fisica dellelastico  che la resistenza che offre cambia a seconda della tensione applicata e questo pu risultare un po scomodo in certi esercizi o anche per una migliore ripetibilit degli stessinel complesso  un attrezzo che mi sento di consigliare permette di fare tanti esercizi a un prezzo davvero basso per non aspettatevi la resa o la comodit di una palestraper quanto riguarda questo specifico prodotto presenta alcuni componenti un po cheap come le fascette e i moschettoni ma al momento  solo una sensazione perch non si  ancora rovinato nulla un secondo ancoraggio da portafinestra sarebbe stato comodo per poter avere maggiore velocit nel cambio esercizio in ununica sessione di allenamento un ancoraggio basso e un altro alto sarebbe comodo ma organizzandosi ce la si faconcludendo per il prezzo al quale si pu comprare lo consiglio e ne sono soddisfatto

prod_name: resistance bands set of 5 with handle strength exercise resistance band
title: a good value item for the price range and quality
review: i bought this item for my mother who as she reaches her middle years has decided to do some fitness workoutsthese resistance bands provide an easy stress free and gym free way for her to get in her exercisethe bands are the perfect range of weight for a woman in her early s and feel strong and intuitive to use the door wedge and hand holds are also very useful and expand the way my mother is able to workoutmy only gripe is the quality of the bag and the exercise instruction manual are somewhat lacking compared to the rest of the setall in all a very impressive set for the price range and certainly a good way for a middle aged woman to ease herself into exercise  although if youre particularly fit you may be looking for something with more resistance

prod_name: resistance bands set of 5 with handle strength exercise resistance band
title: un kit para hacer ejercicio en casa a un precio ms que asequible
reviewer: veramente belli arrivati nei tempi previsti e resistenti anche allacqua
review: lo compr para hacer ejercicio en casa los das que no pueda ir al gimnasio o para cuando vaya de viajecuando recibo el paquete me encuentro con los siguientes elementos  bandas elsticas de diferente elasticidad amarilla  verde  roja  azul  negra cada banda dispone de un gancho de anclaje en cada extremo para poder insertar los siguientes accesorioso  empuaduras de goma y  correas para anclar las bandas a nuestros tobilloso  anclaje para enganchar las bandas a una puerta o ventana adems el pack incluye una bolsa para guardar todo el material muy til especialmente para llevarlo a cualquier parte contigo y una gua con algunos ejemplos de ejercicios los materiales parecen resistentes ltex nylon y metal las empuaduras se encuentran recubiertas de un acolchado que las hace realmente cmodassi buscas en internet podrs encontrar multitud de ejercicios aparte de los que ya explica en el papel que incluye el kitrecomendados totalmente le doy  estrellas porque realmente me parece muy buen equipamiento por un precio ridculo

title: buone bande elastiche funzionali e resistenti ma poco scivolose
review: ho comperato queste bande elastiche per potermi esercitare senza utilizzare attrezzaturegrazie a i vari agganci e alla versatilit di poter scegliere quali bande utilizzare il prodotto garantisce unottima flessibilit ad ogni livello di fitness e forzadal punto di vista della qualit mi ritengo soddisfatto anche considerando il prezzo modico ma onestamente ho in passato provato bande che avevano un livello di elasticit leggermente superiore e quindi garantivano movimenti pi ampi ho inoltre notato che il materiale di queste bande e particolarmente aderente e in alcuni esercizi la mancanza totale di scorrimento tra le bande e i vari agganci limita ulteriormente un movimento fluido e continuo

prod_name: resistance bands set of 5 with handle strength exercise resistance band
title: good for beginners and seniors
review: i bought these resistance bands for strength training as i am a senior and dont particularly want to join the lycralithe at the gym the bands are graded from very light to heavy i started on the lightest yellow but needed to grade up as it was too light but can see that the lightest would be great for someone recovering from an illness etc i then started on the red band and used that for some weeks before progressing to the blue band however i aim to stay with the blue for a while as they can be tremendously deceptive you really dont feel as if you are making an impact but believe me you are i have found them easy to use and very flexible and have been following an exercise regime on youtube specifically designed for my age group i do prefer the tubes with handles as they seem more stable and dont give you whipped buttocks like the bands do if they slip yes i have had that experience and it really hurts i would recommend these for anyone thinking of starting out to getting fit and they seem to have received favourable reviews when comparing them against gym equipment easier to use portable and the same benefits eventually

prod_name: resistance bands set of 5 with handle strength exercise resistance band
title: the handles are poor quality
review: although i was using all  bands together for most exercises i would have expected the plastic in the handles not too bend and split after a few monthsim careul not to overstretch the bands themselves so no damage to those so far but its tricky using these bands without one of the handles i can still use the ankle straps as an alternative for multiple bands but theyre not a great substitiute for single band workouts you can hold the band itself the coloured rubber parti think ill try the loop bands no handle to break

review: es un pack muy completo que incluye cintas elsticas de diferentes resistencias  kg la cinta amarilla  kg roja  kg azul  kg verde y  kg negravarios accesorios  mangos de gomaespuma  correas ajustables con belcro para los tobillos  correa con un tope para colocar en la puertauna bolsa para guardar todoy una tabla con  ejercicios para realizar pero si buscas por internet hay infinidad de ellosla calidad me parece muy buena las cintas son muy flexibles y resistentes las uso prcticamente todos los das y por ahora no presentan ningn tipo de defecto o desgasteadems ocupan poqusimo espacio se recoge todo en la bolsa y se puede guardar fcilmente en cualquier sitio o transportarlas como mucha comodidadson realmente tiles si no tienes tiempo o no quieres ir a un gimnasio la mayoria de los ejercicios requieren muy poco espacio para realizarlos
