prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great
review: bought for a totalgym xls  does the trick  prefer it to single handles for some movements  just a word of warning one of the clips popped off mid movement  no big deal but be aware of it  would recommend

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: the grip is amazing
review: very good part to go with the total gym great seller and service thank you

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: perfect for evo gym
review: i love this product  it has such a great feel to it  the grip is very easy on the hands yet still very grippy when you need it to be  its the perfect size for my tower

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: fits perfect on my bowflex
review: i bought this specifically to use with my evo gym so my review will be geared towards that its the same width as the evo gym platform the padding on the bar is comfortable and the bends are in just the right places ive been using this primarily for bicep curls upright rows and tricep push downs but it works fine for squats as well

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: good tension easy to put together
review: strong comfortable

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: vert good
review: this weider work out machine is great im  and it worked good for me and i can tell when this carona virus is over and people can come to my house again  it will also work for one of my grandsons who is   i love that you can start out with light weights and work your way up and the bungie tension increaser is easy to change you will want more weight when using your legs  i put this together all by myself not bad for a  year old woman if i can do it you can do it  i am so happy with this machineoh yes i recommend buying the work out bar that is sold seperately

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: works great
review: nice

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great addition to the bowflex  could use longer extensions
review: dont know why it doesnt come with the bow flex pr

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: overall this is a nice bar for the buck
review: this is a nice sturdy bar which has allowed me to have more lat routines with my bowflexthe only downside is that the  extension cables are too short for some exercises  it would be nice if the company sold separately extension cables for this bar for different lengths

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: NA
review: im using this on my bowflex machine and it works well i wanted it for then bends to help relieve pressure on my wrists while doing biceps and triceps exercises  my only critique is that i wish the bends were a bit more angled the quality is good a it is sturdy i havent had the loose bolt issue ive seen in other revues there is enough clearances so the cables dont bind overall im pleased with my purchase

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great accessory for my total gym
review: this accessory has made it possible to do more strength exercises

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: exactly as expected works great
review: exactly as hoped for and great accessory and great price too

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: this is what bowflex should have invented
review: now i can finally do a decent incline bench press on my bowflex revolution the alternative was to use the provided hand straps when you put the revos arms down low there is no slack in the lines so if you need to add a lot of weight you might need a spotter to lift the bar off the bench to slide under it or buy more links to give you more slack of course you could simply buy a weight barweights and use the bowflex bench but whateveri checked the two end screws before using after seeing a review where one screw broke off on mine one screw was loose and could be turned by hand i suspect that might have caused that screw to break off as reported by the other reviewer so check yours before using

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great for total gym i recomend
review: we love it

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great accessory
review: this is a really great accessory to my tg  its fun to use and i can feel results in abdominal traps upper and lower arm areas  i love using the ez curl bar   its quick and easy to attach and makes my core feel well worked  a worthwhile purchase and not too expensive is one of my new favorite attachments and not too costly  i recommend this item

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: good product
review: works great with my bowflex but arrived damaged metal bar under rubber is also dented which may compromise the integrity of the bar the dents on the black rubber as shown has permanent pressure dents so absolutely something was stacked on top of box for quite some time but overall the bar serves its purpose

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: exact
review: la photo ne represente mal ces seulement la bare

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great addition for bowflex pr
review: ive been looking for a curl bar for a while to go with my bowflex pr the bowflex is great but with the  there arent many attachments that accommodate it however when i came across this curl bar i went ahead and ordered it it came in promptly and works like a charm i love how it has latches on both sides so it works with the pr like a charm

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: disappointed on design
review: as far as an easy bar this product is fine itll do the job however after using this for less than a month one side bolt that holds the carbineer in place pulled out of the threads understand im using this with a bowflex so we arent talking solid weight stress looking at the design the bolt that holds the carabineer in place is not correct size there is a shoulder on the bolt that should tighten up against the threaded insert inside the bar allowing the carabineer to rotate on the shoulder freely which would allow you to do the arc of a curl etc but the carabineer is pinched between the bolt head and the easy bar before the shoulder tightens against the threaded insert when you pull the weight there carabineer turns which in turn rotates the bolt ever so slightly after time the bolt gets loose then it pulled out i had to rethread the bolt and the threaded insert but it still is incorrect bolt only way i can make the shoulder of the bolt butt up against the threaded insert is too grind some of the easy bar off allowing the bolt shoulder to reach the threaded insert to much hassle for what it costs im disappointed this easy bar would have failed much sooner if i was using actual weight instead of a bowflex

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: you may quickly get attached to this attachment
review: i only gave it  out of  stars because the handle came with a few indentations and scratch marks on it see pictures  other than that the bar is well made and easy to use  comes with around  inches of wire cord and quick clips that are easy to attach  this is perfect for  handed bicep curls preacher curls tricep skull crushers reverse grip skull crushers and upper chest pullovers  decent price for a solid attachment for the total gym

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: thrilled with this bar
review: im using this on my total gym and i couldnt be happier with itarthritis in my shoulders and wrists forced me to stop using free weights switching to the total gym let me get back to resistance training but then arthritis in my cmc joints lowest thumb joint near the wrist was being aggravated using the individual hand grips on that apparatus switching over to the ez curl bar has alleviated all the pain i was experiencing and i can do both pulling and pushing exercises with iti love it highest rating and highly recommended

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: comfortable grip
review: great attachment for my total gym fit comfortable grip  seems to be made well the regular handles attached to the cables were causing pain to my wrists when i do bicep curls  the ez curl bar solved that problem for mei paid the current prize of   my friends tell me it was  pre pandemic so i know this was overpriced oh well

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: nice piece of equipment
review: i thought this was a bit pricey but its really well made and i can feel the difference when i do arm curls especially close in arm curls i get a good burn on my shoulder rows i bough this to use with my weider ultimate gym and it fits perfectly with it i would definitely recommend this accessory

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: best accessory i could have ever added
review: i always felt the total gym was great but lacked the ability to fully replicate gym qualify bench pressing and bicep and triceps workouts fullyby adding this bar attachment i can say i now have a total gym free weights style quality workout on the total gym worth every dime i am fully satisfied and recommend this attachment to anyone who wants to transform and upgrade their total gym experience to new levels

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: be careful exposed wire cable
review: i was excited to use this bar but ended up slicing my finger taking it out of the box from one expose wire cable

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: works with weider body works
review: works good with the weider ultimate body works much easier than the separate handles it comes with there was impression marks in the foam but doesnt affect use bit expensive would have rather payed  than

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: works on the weider ultimate body works gym too
review: i bought this to switch up the handlegrip options on my weider ultimate body works machine yes it fits and yes its a great addition it  seems to be well constructed so i am hoping to get a lot of use out of it

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: a must have for total gym
review: bought this knowing i could use it for a few bicep  tricep workouts but ended using it for many more  quality is  star and has transformed to the total gym into a far more useful machine  i cancelled my gym membership due to total gym and the ability to workout whenever i can  this just solidified my reason for cancelling

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: much better than origingal grips for certain exercises
review: i removed the clips that came with the product and left on the ends of the cables for the total gym  that way i have the equivalent to quick connect for it and the original grips which are still neededi ordered this along with their squad stand and both packages have some of the best packagings ive ever received  would buy again but i dont see either of these products failing me

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: for the price cant beat it
review: hooked to my total gym fit pretty quickly little bit narrow for me but wider would probably mess with the way the weight is distributed throughout range of motion this size seems to keep steady resistance throughout full range will update if it falls apart but from initial workout i was extremely pleased and it really makes the machine more usable if u spent  bucks or  bucks on your machine this  buck piece seem a no brainer

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: well made strong
review: ive been using this bar for a while now it definitely improves the stability when doing bicep curls and tricep extensions its well made the imprints that another reviewer mentioned were also on mine i think its a manufacturing issue it does not affect the quality its easy to put on and take off

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: good quality makes my total gym much better with more helpful moves
review: this made a nice big difference in alternate movements and angles very good quality packaged well and arrived quickly great value for the money  while i didnt trust or know enough of the producing company to get their full total gym type machine i took a chance on their accessory and can say im glad i did it is a great addition for my new tg machine

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: no bearings just screwed ends holding its clips
review: not terrible does its purpose but was expecting better quality  ends are just clips with a screw at the end holding it in place  would be  stars if ends were a bearing

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: great exercise attachment
review: the bar adds to the effectiveness of the exercises being performed it allows the user to be able to utilize an even amount of force on the muscles  the use of the cables alone on certain exercises may cause uneven exertion of muscle strength the bar is a great product attachment

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: works great with old school bowflex
review: bought this to use with an og bowflex for curls rows and tricep extensions  works perfectly

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: sturdiness
review: i really like this bar but i think it is a little pricey

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: excellent curl bar
review: i like this curl bar i dont have a total gym but i use it for my bands i got the tube band i have the pull up stretch bands and it works excellent when im doing curl chest back it a all around tool to use im disable an still having fun exercise

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: very sturdy curved handles make it easy to conduct exercises
review: this bar makes it easy to conduct many different exercises on my bowflex

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: steady versatile curlbar
review: love it i was looking for a curl bar for my bowflex this worked out perfectly

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: easy to attach and remove
review: the ez curl bar is easily attached and removed making it easy to use with the total gym a good feature is that the current handles do not have to be removed to attach the ez bar to the total gym also the ez bar helps in having the same amount of weight on each arm so the arms are exercised evenly if you have a total gym i would highly recommend this item

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: weirder full body curl bar
review: durable and perfect for the price

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: big improvement for my dual cable machine
review: reasonably priced accessory for my dual cable machine added a whole bunch of new potential exercises arrive quickly and in perfect condition like the rubberized finish and that comes with its own carabiners

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: not disappointed
review: this bar is exactly what i was looking for it seems to be well made and to this point withstands use with suspension straps and  lbs dead weight no disappointments i will reevaluate after extended use

prod_name: ez curl bar - heavy weight training accessory designed for total gym
title: dont waste your money on any other bar this is identical to any high end bar
review: if you are looking for a cost effective bar for your bowflex home revolution gym get it honestly it wont matter the brand of your cable machine this will work for various exercises

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: relatively inexpensive but versatile introduction to kettlebell
review: i use the kb with  and  lb olympic  weight plates and cheap sand weights for various exercises from bicep curls tricep kickbacks oh presses kb swings turkish getups etc and so far i cant say one bad thing about this versatile kbprosstrong metal castironergonomic  traditionalangled handle great for wrists eg especially holding it to the chest for goblet squatsheavy duty weight and feel can probably take a beating but the threads could come loose over time if you doeasy twist pin allows relatively quick weight changes sminconsrecommendationsi would like the pin style to be modified so that you twist the whole bottom plate is the nut with a solid pin attached to the headtop of the kb it could easily by modified so that there are finger holes to loosen the nutbottom plate with one hand while holding the kb in the other arm it would also allow you to use the kb without any fake weight spacers as the bottom plate would then attach to the pin via threads just a thoughti highly recommend this adjustable kettlebell things that i thought i would also mention it is smaller than expected it seems the kb was designed to fit  lb weight plates very well but  lb plates are wider sand and cant hold as many as metal plates and  lb metal plates are larger in diameter than the kb itself see picture not that this should be an overall deterrent for anyone since a you can still mix and match  and  lb plates of sand andor metal either way and b it is my own error for not measuring weight plates and looking at the dimensionsdiameter of the kb before purchasing again this is a nonissue for me i was just a bit surprised to see that the kb diameter was much smaller than i expected though the ad states the kb is rated for only  lbs max i have used xlb metal plates w the kb bringing it to  lbs total without issue well so far the threads to the pin are relatively wide and the steel is strong but i assume theyve capped the max weight at lbs since they assume the threads will wear down significantly quicker with regular use wear and tear ie putting the kbs down hard vibration etc and could become loose enough to wriggle free thus reducing their likelihood of liability ill update the post if i notice quicker than expected loosening of the threads but so far to date  weeks or use everyday it seems to stay tight and strong

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: it is exactly what you think it is
review: i think this is a good way for people who dislike gyms or live in remote areas to be introduced to kettlebells a lot of versatility in weight adjustment and it gives you a feel for kettlebell exercises start with just the  weight or add weight if you need to on an easy program such as the simple six and go from there an honest couple of months of use will have you determining if you want to make a further investment in regular kettlebellsits not going to be perfect for quickly changing weights if thats your thing and it definitely cant be tossed around like regular kettlebells kind of an asset as itll encourage you to properly park your kettlebell but for the kettlebell curious beginner on a restricted budget it can be a good startbtw you dont need to go heavy right away to make gains this is a good starting point

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: NA
review: feels like a real kettle bell adjustablethis feels like a real kettle bell the handle how it balances how it swings even how it sets down on the ground feels like the real one this has to be the best adjustable kettle bell on the market right now but there is one negative if you do farmer walkrun with it the  big center screw will get loose i have ran with it at lbs xlbs plates and at every m or so the screw is loose by about  turn it is not a lot and honestly i am probably safe to run longer distances with itall in all i love it it is worth the buy i only wish this carry a bit more weight and the whole thing could be tighter

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: must have
review: this is a really great addition to a home gym when you want to incorporate kettlebell exercises without buying individual bells the grip isnt super thick so i can grip it easily its quick to change the weight and the diameter of the spacers allows you to use lbs cap weight plates you can buy from a place like ct perfectly the only thing is if you wanted to get to lbs total youd have to toss on a lbs plate that will make it wider than the spacerslbs and that might be awkward depending what youre doing otherwise its extremely sturdy and doesnt feel like its going to fall apart i regularly use it at lbs for swings and feel confident in itfinally i dont understand why so many reviewers are surprised that this doesnt come with the weights to expand this to the max capacity the description and multiple images for the product clearly show that its a base of lbs with lbs spacers in between until you add separate weights theres absolutely no way that you would be able to buy a lbs adjustable kettlebell with all the weight plates included for the price of this on amazon buying individual kettlebells for each size would also be way more expensive than this adjustable one plus the plates its not the fault of the product that these reviewers arent understanding that i definitely think this is a great product

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: great product and value
review: this is a great value if you have the right plates already available and if you can start off at  lbs  it will save you lots of money and storage space over buying individual kettlebells  while the handle is only  lbs just under  kg its a big jump  to put on the base to make it  lbs this kettlebell plus    lb pancake plates gets you to the maximum of  lbs  kg  however i prefer about  percent jumps in weight so i added in a combination of  close to half kilo  just over a kilo and  lb plates i had from my dumbbells with the s and that provides a  lb range  kg in  or  lb increments about same as half kilo to  kg jumps  this gives you the versatility to have very small to very large jumps in weight load  finally it is about as tall as a traditional  lb regular kettlebell but the handle is a little more squared although not as much as a competition kettlebell  also how you stack the plates and plastic spacers will greatly affect the balance and feel  overall i found this to be a great option when i just started to learn kettlebell exercises and needed lighter weights i was then was able to inexpensively add weight to the same piece of equipment as my strength increased

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: good sturdy and versatile adjustable kettlebell option
review: appreciate the sturdy handle and base the handle is similar to regular kettlebells and is made of metal so itll be durable the size of the kettlebell as it comes is on par with other kettlebells of similar weightyes if you want to increase the weight beyond lbs by replacing some of the plastic spacers with regular  weight plates then you have to buy those separately as clearly stated in the ad one ramification of that  as individual weight plates will have different circumference depending on the weight the assembled kettlebells shape will also change to be more ovali went to a local fitness store and bought a couple of lbs plates and one lb plate see pics unfortunately the lb plates were sold out width wise the lb plate is about the exact circumference of the existing plastic spacers and i suspect that the lb plate would be just slightly wider the lb plate is wider so itll make the kettlebell wider at that point  but that is similar to regular kettlebells that have a ball shape you just have to adjust your stance when doing swings as you normally would anywayoverall good piece for those of us with limited space at home and dont have room or money to buy multiple kettlebells of different weights

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: works well
review: i bought  of these so i didnt have to swap weights all the time mid workout still cheaper then buying a whole set

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: great kettlebell
review: this thing has gotten me addicted to kettlebell workouts may buy a second one if you have some weight plates kicking around its well worth the cash my only complaints are its a little slow to change weight if you wanted and it can loosen slightly nowhere near enough for the weight to fly off though i regularly use it at lbs with no issues other than the odd  turn tightening

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: does not include weights
review: i dont like how this item states that it can adjust from  to  lbs but does not provide the weightsi sent it back

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: love this kettlebell
review: absolutely love this kettle bell super versatile  with  lb plates you can get weights between  pounds sure enough to keep me goingvery sturdy but be careful about dropping it  mine broke at the mounting bolt after about a year and a half i immediately got another one this time with insurance for  extra also great value

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: great lb kettle bell
review: i wanted a bell that i could add lb weights to and this bell was a great choice i currently use only the lb handle for a minute workoutand what a workout i am pleased that once i build my strength that i can purchase more weights from canadian tire in lb increments the bell itself is a total  pounds so this currently suits my needs the bell is secure  no risk of weights flying off the bottom lock ensures safety the grips is suitable  i reviewed other bells reviewers complained about handles becoming slippery when working out but this cast iron handle is great i highly recommend this bell for a safe and excellent workout check out zen kahuna on youtube if you want a challenging and fantastic kettle bell workout

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: good concept poor execution
review: while the concept of this item is good the execution of it is not  the bottom screw that holds the plates is difficult to use which would make it difficult to quickly adjust weight settings during rest periods in between sets  im also not confident it would hold the weights during swings  the material is also more slippery than a traditional kettle bell which would make the grip more difficult to hold onto during swings for example  listen to the negative reviews on this one  they were totally on point  and this item was immediately returned

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: goodkettle bells
review: good quality and comfortable to use

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: so much better than the last adjustable kettlebell i bought
review: its great  its a size shape and weight range that makes sense and therefore works really well

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: works with  inch plates you provide butchanging out stinks
review: i bought this device to try as my fixed kb collection was taking up too much space  i had a pile of  inch hole  lb plates not being used so gave it a try  note the little discs in the picture are just plastic spacers for when not loading  lbs the handle is  lbs and the base is lb so you have lbs with no additional platesit does sit flat on the floor with no protrusion on the bottomthe part you secure is recessedmain issuechanging plates sucks and mid workout double sucks lets say you are using lbs total and want to add a plate to make it lbs  you have to stop your workoutflip it overtry and untighten the bottomthen balance it with the plates and discs slipping aroundline up the holes while adding a plateand retighten  too much time and effort  now your heart rate is downyou are cooling offsecond issue with this systemdo not try to do cleans or racks with this it is a totally different shape with  lb plates than a static round kb  basically i use this for swings only where i do not plan on changing it out in between sets  using lb plates is not what i had in mind to get the weight i neededalso the piece that tightens on the bottom will not stay secured  your fingers will just fit in the recessed indent and finger right will not hold for long  no issue with weights coming completely off or anything but the handle turns loose and weights may shift  i tap the bottom piece with a hammer but it is plastic covered and causes damagei plan to just load this with  or lbs total and leave it set up that way static all the time for  hand swings or goblet  sumo squats kind of defeats the purpose of why i bought it in the first placethe biggest pro was it did provide a way to organize and occasionally use my old  lb plates lying aroundupdate honestly this is very limited in functionality and sits most of the time  i did spot a kettlebe video series recently by mark wildman about loading unloading weight workout  low to high positions where i may finally get some more use from this  i may try that workoutbut overall  i can not recommend this handle system item for purchase and would not buy again

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: perfect fit with  lbs plates from dumbell set

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: minimal space and versatile with its adjustability
review: this adjustable kettlebell is great the amount of space it takes up is minimal but because its adjustable it provides you with great versatility the combination of weights you can have with a singular kettlebell and some weight plates cannot be beat all you have to have are standard   plates to take the lb kettlebell which is its base weight and increase according to the weight needed for your specific exercises

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: a great way to start
review: this thing got me down the kettlebell rabbit hole i used it as is with the spacers for probably the first month or so and then added lb plates once fully loaded it proved to be a great challenge and work out some reviews are upset that it didnt come with weights but if theyd simply read the description or looked at the provided images they wouldnt have been so disappointed if youre on the fence id say go for it

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: great value easy to use
review: not exactly ergonomic but itll get the job done  i dont know why there are so many negative reviews about the lack of weight platesthe description clearly states that it comes only with spacer discs that can be replaced with standard weights sold separately  the discsplates are easy to remove or add and seem to stay sturdily  at least none have come flying off yet  being used to using regular kettlebells at the gym having such a large handle when using relatively light weights is confusing to my muscle memory but its workable the handle size is only really noticeable when doing swingsdoesnt really matter when doing carries goblet squats dls etc

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: great for space saving adjustable weight kettle

prod_name: bcbig dumbbells set
title: broke after a year

title: NA
review: ive been using these mats for eight months in my home gym and theyve proven to be a very reliable choice they offer durability comfort and ease of assembly making them a great fit for my workout spacesize and coverage with two packs of the tile set ive covered a sufficient workout area each tile measures  x  x  thick providing ample cushioning and support during exercisesdurability and nonslip these mats have held up well under daily use providing a nonslip surface for secure workouts the textured shockabsorbing surface is comfortable and protectiveeasy assembly assembly is a breeze with these lightweight puzzle pieces and they can be fairly easily rearranged to suit different exercise needsmultipurpose use these mats have proven versatile serving as a comfortable and easytoclean floor for both my home gym and play areas theyve even accompanied me on camping tripscosmetic wear after six months of use there are minor cosmetic blemishes on the mats likely from heavy equipment or weights however these havent affected functionalityin summary the yesall puzzleinterlocking exercise mat tiles are a solid choice for home gym flooring theyve held up well and provide a comfortable and secure surface for workouts despite minor cosmetic wear they continue to serve their purpose effectively i recommend them to anyone seeking an affordable and practical flooring solution for their workout or play spaces

review: just enough mat for the whole room used for a home gym great price and easy installation

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: thank you
review: thank you

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: me encant
review: es un excelente material solo les recomiendo leer las dimensiones para que se ajuste al espacio que tengan determinado a mi se me pas medir

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: average product that could have been better
review: all the mats came in good condition nothing was damaged each piece interlocked with all the others with no issues i bought these mats to set a small tactile boundary for when im doing vr fitness and for the most part it works for my purposes what areas could be improved the first time i used it i was barefoot and after my workout my feet were black and a bit slippery so i guess whatever coating is on the mat transfers off i have these mats on hardwood and the mats have no grip at all so i found the mat slipping a bit around the surface of the floor which is unfortunate i will have to apply some type of antitraction material to the underside maybe a few rubber nubbins so that the mat slip doesnt happen which could be very dangerous for vrthe price for  mats is also on the expensive side and knowing how the product functions now for my purposes i think i would have been better off buying a couple of thicker yoga mats to avoid the slipping and because rolling up a yoga mat is much easier than lockingunlocking all the mat pieces again since i store it under my couch when not in use

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: soft  durable
review: i used these to set a sturdy noncarpeted surface under my guinea pig cage works perfect and is very easy to clean

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: great inexpensive gym flooring
review: these worked great over my bare floors in the basement to make a gym floor  might not work for a commercial gym but working great for my personal home gym zero issues

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: good sound dampening under my stationary bike
review: i just got a stationary bike and needed something on the floor for sound dampening and to protect my new hardwood floors these did the joball the pieces come with two edge pieces so if you want to do a x and a x or two x areas youll be short a couple edge piecesthe mat is textured on top but it still feels a little slippery in socks or barefooted but since i use it for a stationary bike this was ok with me if you want it for working out on i might find something with more traction

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: garage turned to yoga gym
review: sq ft   tilea boght for mini yoga session at home garage placethis is nice to cover coldhard suffice under the yoga mat  tiles provided good enough coverage with enough space for pplim puchasing same size again to provide full coverage not very thick but good enough

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: easy setup
review: purchased for a softer workout area in garage pieces fit well and it has good padding seems like it could have many uses such as a place for toddlers to play if you have hardwood definitely eases strain on legs

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: true review
review: so im writing this because this product had bad reviews but i think its competitors  so you can use this outside works under inclement weather ie hurricanes stayed in good condition

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: they work
review: these are a little thinner than i expected but they seem to get the job done we purchased them to put under our rebounder to protect the hardwood floors so far theyre working

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: easy to assemble
review: very easy to assemble

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: good quality
review: good quality for the price

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: offgassing is brutal
review: i set these up right away and figured the extremely strong chemical odor would go away if i left the windows open nope next i heavily mopped each side of these with half vinegar and half water nope now theyre out in my front yard and im hoping the sun can off gas them but being that its winter the sun isnt so bright and the time allotted to a good amount of sunshine is limited honestly if i knew they were going to be this stinky i would have waited until summer so that i could just leave them outside to cook

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: durable and enough
review: this is durable and plenty of tiles were sent to cover the area that i needed

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: very practical
review: love the versatile use

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: works ok
review: trying to find a solution for using a pvovle mat on carpet these help the mat to not bunch up so thats good and solves a big part of what i was struggling with however the pieces start spreading apart themselves a bit and the whole mat moves so i have to adjust itpush it back together during andor after my workout the mat moving is no fault of the mat  just doesnt weigh enough to stay immobile on carpet  but i wish the pieces would stay interlocked better

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: mats
review: they come apart easily but i quess they will do

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: slips and slides
review: more plastic than rubber doesnt hold to the floor as i expected great for padding but not good for rigorous exercising joints dont hold together well either for the price point its not worth returningjust a bit disappointing that it doesnt do what they say or what i expected

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: buy a few extra pieces
review: easy to install

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: affordable flooring solution for my home gym
review: i have a home gym in my basement and since the floor is hardwood i was looking for a soft solution in the event i ever dropped a dumbbell or something similar i used these to cover a roughly  x  area and they worked great easily locking together and staying in place had the whole thing done and my equipment moved in less then  minutes i have a few pieces left over so ill probably set them up nearby for floor exercises good product

prod_name: yes4all interlocking exercise foam mats
title: very durable
review: this is a great product

title: very good
review: i am very happy with the product

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: far cheaper than a curl bar
review: overall this is a good product id recommend i got it for  but i dont think id pay more than thatthe good it is compact and looks very clean the design is appealing and the foam cushion on the bar is just thick enough to not be a hindrance ive never had adjustable dumbbells before so being able to drop weight was nice plus i took the plates on a nice ruck and they fit in my backpack well it is also available in a time where workout equipment is overpriced and scarcethe minor bad flawsthere is black paint on the side of the plates and after a month or so ive rubbed some spots clean with my outer knucklesthe dumbbell handles do not appear to be locked in place but appear that they can be twisted on their individual metal bars this hasnt been a problem yet but if you took this thing apart every day i could definitely see the wear causing it to spin more out of placethe big badthis thing is a pain to put together and take apart i dont use the dumbbell functions anymore as i have my own attaching the first dumbell to the center bar is easy attaching the second is a much harder task im pretty strong screwing the second in requires you to hold it perfectly level and screw it in for about  seconds before it catches you wouldnt think this would be that bad but theres no way to do this that isnt incredibly awkward and twisting a  pound dumbell around while also holding it up one handed puts alot of strain on your wrist i essentially leave the inside plates loaded and load and unload the outside plates as needed i think this is more a design flaw than anything and could be fixed by someone smarter than ioverall its a good clean looking product if youre looking for lb barbell to do curls and bench with since the gyms are closed this is a good fit for you you wont find a cheaper option thats actually of good build quality at least i couldnt

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: very flexible and easy to use
review: the media could not be loaded                                                                         review with audio commentaryoverall take on the weight set the attached video shows the barbell to dumbbell conerversion the rubber material used is nice and flexible for the grip you are able to secure the weights in place by using bolts included these are a great value  it is great because it is so flexible  you can quickly change between barbell and dumbbells rubber coating on weights is a nice touch i recommend this to anyone who is trying to build their home gym in an economically efficient way as this product is features two essential weight lifting tools barbell and dumbbellwhy its useful for my at home gymi already have a cable set this is a bit old but made its appearance again with everything that this year has brought need to stay away from public gyms cable machines are so versatile and an amazing but extremely pricy addition to an at home gym  we were lucky and had an old one already as grateful as i am for a cable machine its really important to use free weights because it forces you to use your core to stabilize the weight i use barbell mode mostly for my leg days to do good mornings and rdls and of course hip trusts i like to use the dumbbell mode for arm days moves i used dumbbell mode for include bicep curls flies and for bench presses

title: great product

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: fine product and helpful seller
review: i wasnt happy when i got this product initially because there were clearly some manufacturing defects with the plates in particular one of the plate had a significant bump inside the ring making it impossible to insert the bari contacted with the seller and heshe apologized and offered me a replacement i received the replacement plate one week later and that one didnt have any defecti have been using this set for a few months so far so good in the end im happy with the purchase the price is reasonable especially comparing to other insane ones on amazon i needed this because i cant go to the gym in the middle of the pandemic

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: great product
review: solid product easy to assemble and screw on the weights love the color they do not roll around all over with the help of the the rubber coating the weight distribution in the plates provided is on point the only downside to these is the fact that they are labeled in kgs and not lbs  having to calculate convert with google was a small inconvenience but everything else about these is great lastly having the ability to transform into a bar is another great aspect of this product would definitely recommend

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: the screw is plastic and loosens after short use

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: voc laden physical fitness equipment from a chinese company that is very hard to source
review: first time opening the box i was hit in the face with a dense cloud of volatile organic carbons and this would not go away i could not return them without paying for shipping which was  so i sat there and stewed over my purchase cursing the heavens that a healthy workout indoors would require the inhalation of chemicals that would preserve a deceased elephant for thousands of yearsi soaked all the weights in containers of baking soda that worked a little but what really had to happen was allow the suns uv plus several days of offgassing to happen but this was not the worst of it the silly foam and plastic padded bars that are provided were the worst offenders of the toxic smells these i had no choice but to tightly seal with several passes of medical andor electrical tape to conceal the vapors to a level that was not very easily detected by the nose im sure a gas chromatograph would beg to differthese weights and bars are just toxic and silly stay away and whatever you do dont ever think youll find anybody behind this product that is easily contacted or is accountable on a level of permissible human toxins in final products with good quality control nope get ready to feel like a lab rat

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: very good

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: not the most convenient but they work
review: this is not the most convenient setup when changing the weight you have to unscrew the whole thing still seeing as i might never view my gym in the same way postcovid its a way to vary the weight without buying separate dumbbells my daughter keeps telling me i should buy the more expensive set we bought her but its a lot of money for a set that goes up to  lbs when  is about my limit to avoid long breaks resetting the weights you can break up your days ie doing all the exercises you do with a lighter weight one day and all those with a heavier weight the next can do the same with dumbbellbarbell i also change off with bands tubes and loops to vary it a bit but lets face it short of spending a fortune on fully equipped athome gym nothing will ever be quite the same

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: functional but takes a long time to put together and disassemble
review: ive had these since november so i waited until march to do a review on the product  for me i do body pump  i am always changing my weights for different muscle groups within a workout  this bar works great but you have to be very strategic in how you set it up for your warmup lighter weights on interior and the interchangeable weights on the exterior  the twisties that hold the weights in place take a long time to untwist and retwist i ended up buying  clamps on amazon to help quickly remove weights and restack my bar between tracks as i believe a workout can be ineffective if you take forever to fidget with your weights  i find that i use them frequently however so it works fine

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: item as described
review: the item was shipped on time  i already used it once  the dumbbells are a little bulkier then what i am used to in gym  if you are using just one set of weights then the rod sticks out and you need to be careful so you dont injure yourself on the face if you are trying to lift it overhead  it can take up to  minutes if you need to change weights during a routine if you want to vary the resistance  otherwise they will work fine  it will help if we have option to buy parts of it separately eg extra rods or extra weights instead of buying a whole set again

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: nice set but came slightly flawed
review: i got the dumbbell set and it was nice and all until i went to screw the yellow clamp onto one of the dumbbell rods and it wouldnt screw on luckily i was able to buy another version of those clamps on amazon that worked great but if i couldnt find a pair of clamps then i wouldnt have been able to use the second dumbbell emailed company about the defect but gotten no response so one less star rating because of the defect but was able to resolve the next day and use them both

prod_name: cdcasa adjustable dumbbells, 44 or 66 lbs weight set
title: handy with the og box as nice storage
review: so i got these as they are a decent enough deal with a coupon and someone had gifted me an amazon gift card and i still could not go to the gym so i said what the heck i am pretty happy with them although they could have some heavier weights with the original seller to go further than  lbs so limited expandability but as far as market price and what it does in its weight range fantastic the original box and the styrofoam make for great storage even if not necessarily intended and will help with saving room

title: complement my workout

prod_name: resistance bands widerstandsbänder
title: comprehensive and versatile resistance bands kit for total body fitness
review: i recently purchased the resistance bands weight building kit and i am thrilled with the diverse range of exercises it has added to my home workout routine this comprehensive kit featuring  elastic bands with a total resistance of  lbs is a gamechanger for anyone looking to elevate their fitness regimenthe variety of resistance levels in this kit is impressive providing options for users of all fitness levels whether youre a beginner or an experienced fitness enthusiast these bands offer a customizable workout experience the colorcoded bands make it easy to identify the resistance level at a glance facilitating a smooth transition between exercisesthe inclusion of anklets and a door grip in the kit adds a new dimension to my workouts the ankle straps are comfortable and secure allowing for targeted lower body exercises while the door grip expands the range of upper body workouts this versatility makes the kit suitable for a wide range of activities including yoga calisthenics gym workouts crossfit trx pilates and morethe build quality of the bands is excellent and they feel sturdy during use the durable latex material ensures longevity and the bands maintain consistent tension even with regular use the set is compact and portable making it easy to take my workout on the go or store it conveniently at homeone notable feature is the ease of incorporating these bands into my existing exercise routine the kit comes with a helpful guide showcasing various exercises making it accessible for users of all fitness levels to create a wellrounded workout planin summary the resistance bands weight building kit offers a fantastic value for its versatility durability and userfriendly design whether youre aiming to build muscle improve flexibility or add variety to your workouts this kit delivers on all fronts i highly recommend it to anyone seeking a convenient and effective home gym solution

prod_name: yes4all barbell foam bar pad - barbell squat pad
title: works great for heavy barbel squats but moves around too much
review: i use this for heavy barbel back squats my working set is about  reps of  pounds i was getting tired of bruised shoulders and cysts from squatting without any cushioning so i found this it does fit onto my standard sized  pound olympic barbell but the main problem is that it wont stay put it doesnt move from side to side exactly but when i am squatting with it it will slide and rotate on the barbell and sometimes rotate to where the opening of the squad pad meets my shoulder causing the pad to slide out of the barbel this actually can create a bit of a dangerous situation when in the middle of a heavy squat ive managed to avoid this issue with a bit of practice and making sure to position the pad at a certain angle before each set to where it wont rotate into the opening but i feel like there needs to be a better way to secure this to the barbellthis does work fairly well with some practice it provides adequate cushioning  actually probably too much cushioning for heavy barbell squats to where the thickness of the pad causes me to have to adjust my form a bit but it still works better than the towel method i was using before and its a much higher quality product that most other pads ive tried which just fall apart ive found this product to be extremely durableif this had slightly thinner cushioning and fit more securely onto the barbell this would definitely be a

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: just what i needed

review: needed something i can work out with when i dont feel like going to the gym it is simple but you can do so many exercise with iti also anchored my trx to this bar and it worked out perfectly feels stable i would recommend it

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: must have simple and easy to use
review: this pull up bar was exactly what i wanted at a great price assembly is a breeze requiring just  bolts and nuts and a wrench is included build quality parts quality overall fit and finish versatility ease of installation and removal usability and sturdiness of this pull up bar are all excellent stays right where its supposed to the included resistance bands handles and resistance band door anchor were a very useful bonus too theres absolutely nothing to complain about im very happy and satisfied with this purchase

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: nice exercise
review: i recently purchased the ally peaks pull up bar for doorway and it has been a great addition to my home gym setup this pullup bar is designed to provide a versatile and effective upper body workout and it lives up to its promisesthe construction of this pullup bar is impressive it is made from thickened steel which gives it excellent stability and durability with a maximum weight limit of  lbs it can accommodate a wide range of users providing a safe and secure platform for various upper body exercisesinstallation of the bar is straightforward it is designed to fit most standard doorways and the adjustable length feature ensures a snug and secure fit without the need for permanent modifications to the door frame its also easy to remove and store when not in use making it a portable and spacesaving fitness solutionone of the standout features of this pullup bar is its multigrip design it offers various grip positions including wide narrow and neutral grips allowing for a wide range of exercises to target different muscle groups this versatility adds to the effectiveness of the workouts and keeps them challenging and engagingusing the ally peaks pull up bar has been a great experience the bar provides a solid and comfortable grip allowing me to perform pullups chinups and other exercises with confidence the stability of the bar gives me the peace of mind to focus on my form and maximize the benefits of each workoutone thing to note is that depending on the doorway and the molding around it there might be slight variations in the fit and stability of the bar its essential to ensure a proper and secure installation to minimize any potential movement during exercisesoverall the ally peaks pull up bar for doorway is a reliable and effective fitness tool for upper body workouts its sturdy construction adjustable fit and multigrip design make it a versatile choice for individuals looking to strengthen their upper body muscles conveniently at home whether youre a beginner or a seasoned fitness enthusiast this pullup bar is a worthy investment for achieving your fitness goals

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: easy set up
review: ive been using this pullup bar for months overall its pretty nice the rubber pads are nice as they prevent the pullup bar from leaving any marks on my doorway its great for chinups and neutral pullups but its kind of awkward for regular pullups because of the placement of the foam grips the accessories that come with it are useless though just do negative pullups if you cant do any regular ones

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: great product for the price  good customer service
review: i am not handy at all and was able to assemble to product in less than  minutes it seems very sturdy as a whole and the soft grips are quite comfortable fits well in a regular doorframe and works as advertised it comes onoff the door in seconds so we tend to remove it every evening just in case it falls off  although it hasnt yetmy husband is ft tall and so he needs to curl his knees to use it we have regular  or  ft ceilings  so that dictates how high off the ground our doorframe is he doesnt enjoy it as much but i get a lot of use out of iti had an issue with the initial package i received  the were that were included were too short i emailed the seller and they rectified the issue very quicklyoverall satisfied with the purchase and would buy again

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: will pull your door trim off
review: cant do a real pull up with it or youll rip your door trim off you should not be putting weight on the horizontal bar as that needs to be the fulcrum by holding on to the horizontal bar youre just pulling the whole system practically straight down so the top retaining bar just gets pulled down and rips off the top door trim you can only put weight on the ends of the  curved posts sticking out in the neutral pull up in their image another horizontal bar would need to be added to the system to do a proper pull up and have it lever into the door frame properly

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: good value for money despite the  stars
review: i didnt want to pay much for a door frame pull up bar so the price of this item was really good when i received it it was easy to assemble took me maybe    minutesthe bar itself once up does feel a bit flimsy but its worked so far and ive had it for a while now like a few months and its holding up great still keep in mind im kg and my husband is about kg  so we arent super heavy not sure how much weight it can handle but im sure the strength of the doorframe will also have a part to playi also enjoy using all the extra bits that came with it feels a bit cheap but when youre on a budget this is great

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway

prod_name: ally peaks pull up bar for doorway
title: overall good product just a few small complaints
review: i like this bar and its held up well to a few months of use the only things id say could be improved are that the rubber sleeves at the end which sit on the silicon pads have a tendency to walk down the bar during use if you use it on a door frame with any kind of taper or curve i have to adjust them every time i use it the foam grips have also started to deform a bit which im not too surprised by i might have to replace them at some point if they start tearing the caps at the end of the bar also sometimes come out of their housing but that doesnt really affect the structural integrity just a small quality thing id like to see improvedi would also like to mention though that i reached out to the manufacturer to ask if they sold extra silicon pads so i could use this bar in multiple locations without damage and they sent me a whole pack of extras for free so i really appreciate that

prod_name: arena strength booty fabric bands
title: so much better than thin plastic bands
review: ive been using the traditional thin rubber workout bands for two years i would often find youtube videos i liked working out to but would give up on a consistent program due to how annoying the thin bands were especially when doing legglute workouts they would roll up on me and become slightly painful to pull against i wouldnt waste the time to readjust them for every move so id just endure the discomfort i just received these thick arena bands and they are worlds better they are super comfortable even against my bare legs i made it through an entire glute workout without them shifting or rolling up i dont think its even possible for these to roll up they have a slightly grippy rubberized interior so that they stay in place i specifically bought the wider straps for leg workouts i noticed right away that they are harder to stretch than my former flimsy plastic bands i used to do this particular workout with the heaviest weight band of my old set and it wasnt much resistance i naturally thought id go straight for the heavy band in the arena set it is waay stronger than my old band i used the lightest band in the arena set and got a better workout than i was with the heaviest strength band in my old set i dont think this means that you need to be advanced to buy the arena set i think it just means my old set was almost useless it provided very little resistance i was worried about paying  for bands thinking it may not be worth it but i am instantly glad i did these make my workout quicker no adjusting needed and more effective they are comfortable working out is already uncomfortable enough without adding in bad equipment why not make it more comfortable where you can and i can tell by the construction they will last very pleased sooo worth it if you workout regularly you should definitely upgrade to these and if you dont workout regularly it might help to have better working more comfortable equipment its definitely motivating to know ill have a successful workout before i begin

prod_name: arena strength booty fabric bands
title: highly recommended
review: highly recommendedbeen using these for a couple weeks now and they are very durable and comfortable  they do not slip which is great and i love that they are machine washablethe little training booklet you get with them is an added extra being quite new to this type of workout out it is a huge helpalso happy that the bands come with a warranty  bit of peace of mindthese are not like some other cheapy bands on amazon worth every penny

prod_name: arena strength booty fabric bands

prod_name: arena strength booty fabric bands
title: very satisfied
review: i read a lot of reviews before purchasing these online and i came across some bad reviews about the quality i emailed the store to ask them what was up and they responded very quickly explaining that they indeed had problems with their manufacturer that it was really unfortunate for them and ensured me that it has all been sorted i decided to trust them and went for it and have been very satisfied with the quality i love that the bands are all the same size while increasing the tension and the fabric aspect makes them really comfortable and doesnt tug on my clothes skin or little hairs the grey band lightest weight probably gets the most use for me and the widest stretch range since its the lightest and i have definitely noticed a bit of loosening over the months hence the  stars the others however are holding up great i honestly use the workout guide thats included in the package every single time i use the bands as a reference or to structure my workout for the day its really useful and even has accompanying youtube videos to better show the exercises the first time i used them i was traveling and the suggested routines in the book are seriously killer i was actually sore the next day which was really unexpected because im usually lifting heavy weights for my booty workouts when im not traveling they include a weeks worth of workouts for situations where you have access to a gym and situations where you dont all around very satisfied

review: i actually have two other brands of fabric type bands one is a set of three but  and  of the set are just smaller in diameter not stronger im tall and a narrower band doesnt even make the exercise possible to do in correct form the other band i have i like but its really strong i bought this set so i could have  strengths of bands all the same diameter thats fantastic i use the weakest for some exercises like donkey kicks ive never been able to have my thigh horizontal to the floor and foot flat horizontal to the ceiling during the repetitions i use the middle band for the walking exercises i havent made it to the strongest band yet  the form used during booty workouts is everything no wonder i couldnt feel the other workoutssecondly the book is fantastic i love it its thick plastic coated pages it gives you lists of exercises to do on several different days and includes workouts to do at a gym with the bands the excellent photographs are extremely high quality you can see the exact form needed i turn on my music open my booklet and do my exercises sometimes exercise videos are annoying because they move too fast you cant tell if your form is correct which is everything or i need to do variations i like doing the workouts by looking at a list it reminds me of workouts at a gym although i have done the arena strength  minute video and found it excellent the model is positioned so you can see how to do each exercise correctly and the entire time you also see her reflection in the mirror so you can tell exactly what shes doingnow regarding customer service i had a odd problem with my order i found the email address for arena strength customer service on the booklet and emailed them with photos within a few hours i had a personal email reply from one of the actual owners of the company two women own this company she was incredible and fixed my issue immediately it already was a fantastic program and product anyhow this just made me a loyal customer thank you arena strength

review: i like to stay in shape by going to the gym but on the days i cant get there i work out at home a person can do a full workout with nothing but a kettlebell even those who make use of every machine in the gym can benefit from workouts with kettlebellsi had a devastating accident then a ruptured gallbladder so you can imagine my workout schedule was set back some because of that setback i had to begin working out almost like a beginner again one of the first things i bought for our home gym was this kettlebell its only five pounds im ashamed to admit that but five pounds is what i need to start with right now ill work up from therethis kettlebell is very well made its so well made that i think it might last forever yet its very reasonably priced it works i do a lot of different exercises with this kettlebell some kettlebell exercises engage every muscle in the body and i want to be able to do them even if its only with a fivepounderif youre just beginning to work out or are elderly or cant use more than a fivepound kettlebell right now i really recommend this one its even better than the ones at my gym just be careful no ones in the way when you swing it

title: great belt
review: if you need some more weight for your pull ups or parallel bars exercises this one is for youi have reached my limit in those exercises and needed something to bring some weight so i chose this product because it was cheap and got great reviews i just want to clarify some things i have read during researchsharpness no this product havent cut me at all and has no sharp edges you just need to know how to connect it to your hip and stand up without it touching i am no expert but i am sure you will find the wayhip size compatibility yes narrow hips can be a challenge however once you put enough weight and start with the exercise gravity will lock the belt to your hip without any problemdurability and usefulness overall this is a great belt even though it is cheap and could be more comfortable i have managed to use it for  lbs without any problem at all i love this belt dont listen to the bad reviewsi really like the case came with it it is super useful i put my gloves in it and head straight to the gym

prod_name: hawk fitness dip belt with chain
title: good for moderate weight if you know how to wear it
review: this weight belt works well for weighted pullups and for moderately heavy belt squats if youre belt squatting more than about  pounds go for a thicker belt and chain the chain and caribiner are good enough below that stitching is good all around theres two drings each with a carabiner left and right i wear the belt by attaching the chain to the left dring and carabiner at the th link use more links if your waist is big theres now a long and short end of chain hanging down on the left take the short end and attach it to the right dring and carabiner somewhere along the  links like a belt buckle then take the long end and attach it to the right side dlink and carabiner that loop now formed holds the weight if you thread the chain through the weight first easypeasy and it doesnt fall off between sets

title: great quality
review: awesome i was shocked at the size of this its huge  appears to be great quality and well designed

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: surprisingly good set of bands
review: i wanted to get in some upper body resistance work but im no spring chicken and after years of overuse my shoulders are not what they used to be so i thought resistance bands would be better than free weights  i ordered the red resistance level which turned out to be absolutely perfect for me  i will say that if you order this you should also order a door adapter that hangs at the hinge of a door which makes the band much more versatile  ive been using this about  days a week  takes up no room unlike heavy free weights its not something youre going to be stubbing a toe on or accidentally dropping and damaging something  unlike most resistance bands i have no worries about this separating from the handle which is apparently a thing with cheaper tubing bands with only one point of connection at the handle  this is solidly made and i expect to continue enjoying it for many yearsupdate after using the red band for years i came back for the next level up the blue band both are used every other day both are flawless have recommended to everyone i know searching for bands

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: son resistentes
review: sirven muy bien para ejercitar el cuerpo

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: buen producto
review: es lo que esperaba funciona muy bien

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: good workout tool
review: i have both level  and level  bands and will say upfront these are not easy to use  you will get a good workout with these as the bands are well designed and i believe will last a long time  i have only had them for a short time but am adding to my workout routine  you need to go to the website to get some exercises to do with these and those might be better done via video but the site is helpful  i would say it might have been smarter for me to start with level  as level  is plenty difficult and level  i am not ready for yet

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: highest resistance band ive come across
review: with this nearly yearlong quarantine it was becoming clearer that i needed a heavierresistance band from the ones i already have i could still get a pretty good workout with some movements such as lateral raises and a couple others but there are some movements were even the conventional heavy band is too easy for example squats presses rows bicep curls and othersthe description of the  woven bands for more resistance and durability sure seemed to make sense as i read it for this product and now from using it a few weeks i can say that it fully delivered as id hoped its nice being able to feel a challenge again and that im actually getting work in some of the movements mentioned above it is a lot of resistance so some movements will still require an easier one for example unless youre super short i doubt theres hardly anyone who could do reps of lateral raises with these fortunately this one purple band is the heaviest and they do sell other bands with less resistancethe only reason its missing all  stars is that the plastic part on the handle is slightly jagged it may seem next to nothing at first but on a couple movements  such as bicep curls its quite apparent and can be a bit irritating something perhaps the manufacturer could look into and then truly make these possible the best bands in market

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: decent piece of resistance equipment
review: it is easy to use provides decent resistance and use options initially the material had an odor which cleared in about three days no regrets with this purchase

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: martha
review: me gust mucho y mi entrenador de acuerdo en que fue una gran inversion muy resistentes y cmodas me convenc a comprar el siguiente nivel

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: great grip and feels like it will never break
review: i love the braided cables in the past ive used other brands that only had a single tube connecting the grips and they broke on occasion this one feels like it will never break i have three different ones and enjoy using them on all kinds of exercises in particular i like taking them on vacations or trips where i wont have access to a gym our trainer gave me several workouts that i can rotate through while away from our gym at home great product

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: good travel option
review: i bought the heaviest version for a week trip to australia where i wouldnt have any access to a gym  i like it much more than nonbraided versions because i am not nearly as worried about the band breaking  and the builtin handle is a plus over continuous loop ones typically the style for heavier resistancei did three main exercises with it a seated row a standing press and a squat so i could effectively work my whole body even without attaching it to a door etc  in all cases i either stood feel shoulder width apart press on the band more than shoulder width apart on the band squat or placed my feet spread widely apart on the band  seated row  this provided heavy resistance i am  as a frame of reference for the standing press moderate resistance for the row and fairly light resistance for the squat  so to me i would say its roughly the equivalent of working out with lbs dumbbells at least for these exercises  for one arm exercises like curls it is very easy to change the resistance by moving your foot that is anchoring the cable to ground either toward or away from the handle you are lifting  when i did these three exercises in rapid sequence it gives a decent circuit trainingmetabolic training effect  i wouldnt want this to be my main training modality but for a portable option i think its the best i have found its hard to work your pulling muscles without equipment  i think its also  particularly good option for older adults who wish to add some strength training to their regimen but arent inclined to lift weights or go to a gym  as there is significant resistance but risk of injury is relatively low  overall pleased with the product given my expectations and needs

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: solid product
review: i feel very comfortable using this without worry of snapping the resistance level is also superb

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: good quality
review: excellent and sturdy feels very good when working out i am    lbs and work out three times a week and holding up well

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: well made high quality bands leave a faint rubber scent on hands when new
review: these are fantastic for doing a pretty good and well rounded workout routine at home something to keep in mind also is that resistance bands differ from weights in a fundamental way since your muscles hold more tension at maximum extension i feel that this gives me smoother movement and better formim probably about as strong as the average desk worker who doesnt spend a ton of time in the gym but does have some active hobbies and im  tall with that in mind i think the blue band gives me a good amount of resistance with room on both sides  to make things harder or easier by controlling the slack if you are about the same strength level but much taller you might consider a lighter band and use the same logic for other scenariosas for these specific bands they are good to look at and seem to be built well and with high quality materials the only con is that the first few times they will make your hands smell like rubberfaintly nothing that a quick wash wont remove

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
