review: great tool for excercise

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: lightweight and great for keeping fit while traveling
review: i bought these to maintain fitness while traveling also have a less resistive red band set for warming up  these do a great job of stretching and pumping while on the road and are very light and compact to fit in luggage  the red is about lbs of resistance and the purple lbs but one of the benefits of these bands is you can vary the resistance based on how short the cable is when you pull  i usually use these as the equivalent of barbells or pulley type weight movements with my foot as the fulcrum the variations of movement are limited only by your imagination and flexibility but dont be foolish and try to attach to furniture or moving objects like doorsthese are now a fixture in my luggage for fitness maintenance when traveling along with the perfect pushup device

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: having  braided tubes is an excellent safety feature
review: i have been using surgical tubing exercise bands with the door attachment for many years  the bands rub against the attachments loop and chafe  this results in their failure after a little more than a years use  that corresponds to somewhat over  repetitions  i had been using the single tube bands  then one failed unexpectedly when i was pulling my arms back away from the door  i landed on my back  head  i switched to the  tube braided version  i have had to replace the quad bands twice since i switched so far  there is essentially no chance that more than one tube will fail at a timelasted  year  months

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: a solid product for a decent price
review: i chose  stars because the heavy resistance band works as a resistance band should ive performed exercises for various muscles with this such as bicep curls shoulder raise and press wrist curls chest press and flys back rows quadricep extensions squats and tricep extensions for the backchesttricepquad exercises i did use a bodylastics door strap in conjunction with this band ive worked up a great sweat using this band im taking one star off because the handles could be a bit sturdier but dont get me wrong the plastic on them is thick and i dont see the band coming undone ever its called taking care of your product the  star poster complaining about the handles breaking when he let them slam into the wall must be a lunkheadthis band will get you toned work out  minutes a day the casual exerciser may perform  reps  second rest between each set  times a week you will see a difference

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: so far so good but
review: so far i like the product  i have had many bands that have snapped in the past regular spri bands  it can be dangerous  it looks like this will be hard to snap unless all the braided bands broke at oncerecommendation to the seller  it would be super helpful if you added the weights of each of the levels in the product description

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: good
review: ive had the medium level  resistance band for  weeks and so far so good the resistance is about  to  lbs and i use it  to  to  times per week not as effective as free weights but it keeps me toned and serves its purposeim able to work out all upper body

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: versatile and plenty of resistance
review: i find this exercise band to be very versatile  i now do virtually all of my upper body strength exercises with this not just while traveling where the portability is great but even at home where i have standard dumbbell weights  the very heavy resistance level provides plenty of resistance for methis is my second purchase of this exercise band  the first purchase lasted about  months of usage  days per week and then one of the four tubes broke  while i wish the band had lasted longer that was a pretty solid amount of usage to achieve which is why i purchased the product again

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: better than i expected
review: had the band for about  months now and average a  dayweek usage its been heavy enough resistance for bicep curls and shoulder raises when i brace it under my feet slightly lagging in resistance when i try back exercises by wrapping it around a pole or tree but overall it provides great stable resistance love the rotating hand grips so i can rotate my wrists when doing curls no issues of the band snapping which is something i was worried about i plan to order the next resistance level up

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: great rope
review: this is my second one i made the mistake of not using the supplied anchor attachment and the braids slowly became shredded i would anchor the rope to cemented park benches rusty fences and pipes etcits strong flexible and great for all exercises if you have the strength to move it

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands
title: better quality than expected
review: the braiding makes this nicer than most resistance bands i have tried the strength seems about right for medium im  and lbs and lift semi regularly i wanted to the band to rehab past shoulder injuries i find it is more than long enough to hold one end on the ground with my foot and do shoulder exercises with either arm only downside if any would be that the handles are not a solid plastic triangle  the anchor is plastic and the grip itself is nicely padded plastic though very sturdy  a mesh straps connect these parts by running through the hollow grip this in no way compromises the strength of the device it probably make it more durable it does make it slightly more difficult to hold the band during certain exercises depending on the angle

prod_name: spri braided xertube resistance bands

review: i have used these same resistant bands at the gym and wanted some for my home workout area  good quality for the

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: best fitness product
review: its sturdy well made and exactly what i was looking for to utilise my existing free weight plates and avoid purchasing multiple kettlebells i prefer kettlebell deadlifts for my dodgy low back and this is great because i can warm up light then add more plates for working sets i dont recall what its rated to carry but i can just fit  x kg plates on the shaft so its essentially replacing a wide variety of kettlebell weights at a lower costone downside of the design is that the shaft obviously needs to be long to accommodate weight plates and locking collars but this makes the whole unit taller than most kettlebells at about cm in height so unless you stand on blocks you wont have the same depth of movement available before the unit contacts the floor i cut a tennis ball and put it on the end of the shaft so it doesnt damage the floor especially when its loaded upall things considered im very happy with it and the unavoidable limitations of its increased height are an acceptable tradeoff against the cost of the multiple kettlebells it replaces

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: NA
review: the construction is simple and solid while fit and finish are little on the sloppy side of things the chrome is solid no flaking anywhere to be seen even if it feels a little slick it does let it work well for more dynamic movements i find myself wishing the handle part was a little thicker but itll still do just fineas others have mentioned the pin does seem to hang pretty low and will hit the floor if you let it hang too low on some movements im  and even for me that seems to be an issuethe nuts supplied are the normal spinlock ones every other dumbell handle seems to have and while they do their job of locking in the weight they seem to work best if you lock them back to back see picturesill be modifying mine to accept a locking pin at the bottom by drilling a  hole thru that will let me load it with one extra plate while feeling safe that the plates cant rotate looseoverall happy with my purchase since itll hold as much weight as i can i can fit on it without causing durability issues and very much securely so after modding the tip to accept a pin plus its a lot cheaper than buying kettlebells from  to lbs

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: solid metal adjustable kettlebell for heavy workouts
review: i like this so much that i bought a second one for additional exercises one per arm they are a great price and unlike others that cannot break since they are completely solid metal i am leery of any kettlebell grip or kettlebell handle for weights that involves any plastic parts since that could fail which is why i bought this instead its great for heavy kettlebell rows heavy gauntlet squats and for swings where you have one in each hand which is why i bought a second one i would not recommend them for other kettlebell movements since it would be awkward with bulky weight plates and i am not that confident in the pair of twist on connectors in those movements since they can come lose while using them for those exercises you need to buy the cheapest traditional kettlebells you can

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: who needs kettlebells
review: solid great value work extremely well with your existing weights  what more could you ask for

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: love it for powerlifting accessory training very wise purchase
review: this item was a little vague in description  but once i recieved it i was very pleased with the construction i can easily put lbslbs total with handle completebefore switching to larger oversized standard plates very secure and if i was to make any suggestion it would be to have the handle knurled for additional aid gripping i added hockey tape works finenot affiliated is any way but people this is a safe buy for anyone looking to use a kettlebell is you already have standard plates

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: item listing of pound option is mislabeled
review: the item listed as the silver  pound option is actually the newme fitness silver chrome adjustable kettleball handle with spinlock threading for  weight platesit is a solid highquality adjustable kettleball handle with good ergonomics  it has a welded on flange collar up near the handlethe two included spinlock collars are used on the threaded bottom of the bar to secure the inch weight plates with redundant spinlocks for security  if the spinlock collars shift as sometimes happens with spinlocks the user will be aware that  spinlock collar has come off before  spinlock collars both come off allowing the weight plates to fall  use both spinlocks on the bottom for this reason when using an adjustable kettlebell handlevwith spinlock collars

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: great buy  been wanting something like this for a while
review: great product  only criticism is that would have been good to have grip on the handle as it can be hard to grip

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: brilliant tool
review: i already owned weight plates this handle lets me use the places as a kettle bell  solid steel construction secure safe design this handle has added new variety to my work out love it

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: good product but not really  olympic sized
review: i have been in the market for an olympic  loadable kettlebell that doesnt cost an appendage or organ i am not a fan of the options i had seen to this point i was thrilled when i saw newmefitness had recently released a  loading pin style kettlebell this design made the most sense to me and the price point was just about perfect  the only thing i did not like about the product from online viewing was they sent a spring clip with it to hold the weights down no big deal i thought ill just use one of my olympic collars and toss the spring it is after all a  loading pin rightwrong the loading pin is mm pictured why on earth did they not just use the olympic standard we are talking adding  or mm to the diameter of the product here to make it fit all your normal olympic equipment snug the plates move around a bit more than they should side to side due to this sizing and you are forced to use their spring collar to keep the weights down i did message them about this and they appreciated my feedback and took it under consideration but left it at thatbeyond my beef with the odd sizing the finish is pretty cheap i have done maybe a couple dozen swings with this and the paint is already chipping on it pictured the head and pin screw are all raw aluminum so i would recommend you put some in oil or something on it to make the joining of the  pieces less grindingbeyond my few small squabbles with it it works fine for most kettlebell moves i have tried thus far i do like the locking level on the head that helps keep it secure when you screw it all the way down nice touch in my opinioni do very much like the design of this product i still think it is the best budget one i have found thus far i think this product could be much better if they would just increase the diameter of the pin so you could use an olympic collar and not their spring clip

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: amazing

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates

review: not sure what to say about this other than im giving it  stars for its innovative design  even if it doesnt work great  had it for a month and might use it soon for the few kettlebell exercises i do the costsavings in buying this but still having to deal with minor issues has got to be worth not having to buy  or  kettle bells of different weights

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: very good for swings and deficit squats
review: i am able to fit   lb rogue hitemp bumper plates on it and i can swing it without hitting my legs but i do have long legs   with a torso slightly shorts than my legs it works great for deficit squats im sure i can fit a lot more weight with steel plates

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: low cost of entry into classic kettlebell training
review: im new to the kettlebell exercise scene coming from a traditional barbelldumbbell  weight machine gym training backroundinitially i just bought one of these adjustable kettlebell handles in order to incorporate    handed kb swings as a supplement to my already existing home gym planafter a short while of messing around with it though  i started to get hooked on the idea of classic kettlebell training in general which is actually quite a bit different then traditional bbdb  gym machine training programsi then purchased a second handle just so i could start incorporating double kettlebell exercisesassuming that you already have a decent collection of low profile weight plates  you really cant beat these quality kb handlesadjustable handles like these are the way to go in my opinion in terms of versatility  cost of entry into classic kettlebell trainingfrom the best that i can tell so far  these handles feel  work the same as a regular kettlebell does  with the exception of them standing a few inches taller which is mostly a nonfactor to me at this pointi did a loading experiment   comfortably fit six  lb  two  lb plates on each handle  with collars   lbs approximately in total  including the weight of the handle this is more weight then ill probably ever need for most any classic kettlebell exerciseyou could even use higher weight denomination plates to load it up even heavier then that  but i think youd run the risk of it being to bulky  which would be less then ideallastly  i would advise purchasingsourcing a supplemental clamping mechanism for these handles i use a pair of flipped upsidedown old school metal screwheadlock vicecollars antislipthese keep the weight plates extra secure   also allow the loaded kettlebell handles to sit balanced  flat on the ground

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: perfect solid solution for a crazy low price
review: first of all i liked loved the cheap cost of this solid steel kettlebell handle  unless you just must have an all in one selfcontained fancy adjustable kettlebell with just a turn of a knob to quick change the weight or you must have the best of the best or bragging rights or you do many drop sets etc then be frugal and safe you cash and get this some of these adj kettlebell sell from   bucks and some have plenty of plastic parts and plastic parts do break then you have an expensive kettlebell paper weightthis solid steel handle does it all for me  only thing is with snatches and some over the head movements could take some getting used to adapting to and mindfully adding smaller  plates only for comfort a kettlebell forearmwrist guard is a darn good idea anyway for even standard kettebell workouts that will save you from bruising and most discomfort  but for swings dead lifts squats and everything else in between you can load this thing up with whatever plates you want to your hearts content this beauty is not going to failthere are some criticisms in the reviews and the even in the few youtube reviews of this handle as to the total length of the treaded bar plus handle being too long some reviewers stated  inches and it does indeed look long in the yt videos but i just got mine a few days ago from amazon and the total exact length of mine is  inches long two inches is a big difference too when swinging this thing around you head or doing swings when you are of the shorter statured varietythe handle is  od inches in width and  id width plenty of room for my hands thickness of handle is of course then  inchthe amazon website description states nonslip handle it is anything but that this handle is shiny smooth chromed steel and i would be careful swinging it in front of a mirror or window even with a full grip you get on it with the one inch thick handle slippery is slippery no matter what grip you have on it havent tried chalk with it yet  it can and does get slippery especially when hands start to sweat a little with your body oils from you handshaving some extra leftover mebmik amazon rubbersilicone grip tape solved any problems of this handle becoming slippery once in a while its a good idea to wipe off sweat and body oils from the grip tape with a little alcohol and paper towel and it cleans that right up and it becomes super tacky again and this grip tape lasts and lasts aamof i will be ordering more today just to have it around for future projects if you intend to do the full kettlebell workout routines then the cloth variety of grip tape would suit you better which helps with grip and comfort but not tacky where your hands will stick to the handle more and you wont be able to swing the handle inside of your grip for snatches and the like  will also try one of the cloth grip tapes to experiment with i only for the time being had this extra siliconerubber tape on handhey sorry about the loooong ss review just wanted to steer some of you in a good direction if your looking to save some money and dont care if you have the latest and greastestand i guess i have way too much time on my hands and need to get a lifejust sitting here staying out of trouble with that damn covid and rampant crime still lurking out therebest regards and good luck to all

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: well made
review: this is the bestmade olympicweight adjustable kettlebell handle that i have found so far this thing handles everything that i put it through the fact that it has a locking collar is also a plusevery other model that i have come across either uses a pin or a screw i did not want to tempt the weight gods and lose a toe or foot this thing is probably geared better toward the milo crowdbe advised that the handle on this thing is big you will find it harder to do kettlebell shoulder exercises it is not impossible to do them you will just have to experiment a little with the weight selection

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: collars improved
review: this is a perfect addition to my existing  barbell set from the s the collars are improved to the star style for easier use i believe the correct way to use them back to back with the rubber rings facing each other not the way it was depicted on the website this will ensure the weights stay in place while you swing the item weighs about  lbs on my scale it will take about seven plates

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: good value and flexibility for a home gym
review: im all about saving space in my home gym so ive been looking at many options for adjustable kettlebells while there are other options that maybe more compact the flexibility of using my olympic plates to adjust weight is greatthe diameter of the shaft where you add plates isnt exactly  so the plates have wiggle room that can cause them to clatter a little however if you set the clamp tightly against the plates it minimizes most motion even with more dynamic motion like swingsits a little clunky to load and because of the extended length to accommodate plates it can make certain exercises uncomfortable or challenging like when the weight rests against your arm in turkish get upsoverall good value and compromise to save space and money in a home gym

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: works as good as expected
review: this works great if you dont want to buy kettlebells but still be able to use them i have lb and lb plates i use on this the only issue is that the clamps spin undone depending on the exercise youre doing when i do clean and presss on my right side its fine but when done on my left the weights spin the clamps loose not too big of a problem so long as you stay cognizant of it and dont allow it to get too loose ive taken to using clamps from my dumbbells on it too so ill have literally five corkscrew clamps on this with  or  weight plates that has limited it loosening up almost completely great product though

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: great adjustable kettlebell and a tip if your collar is loosening
review: great kettlebell handle i bought it mainly to do progressive goblet squats and swings if you already own a collection of plates i bought the  inchstandard model it is much cheaper than buying multiple kettlebells especially if you dont know what size you want compared to my other kettlebells the handle is thinner in diameter about  inch vs  inches or so on the kettlebells but about the same in terms of width side to side fits between your legs the same on the swings not sure how to phrase it so you actually get more room on the inside of the handle to fit your hands the welds are a little sloppy but that is my biggest complaintsince some people are complaining about it coming loose heres a tipif you have never used a spin lock dumbell before the best way to lock the collar in place is to hand tighten the plates first then you put the kettlebell on its side and roll it counter clockwise to the left if you are holding the handle towards you the plates will roll and catch the spinlock after about a  roll they will be locked tight this holds everything tight for  swings with no loosening in fact i sometimes have to knock the collar loose because i cant get it loose by hand after doing this you dont even have to use the second collar provided with this method hope this helps somebody

prod_name: newme fitness adjustable kettlebell handle for use with weight plates
title: versatility
review: i wanted to start working with kettlebells but i didnt want to buy a set of  them in various weights this kettlebell handle is like an adjustable dumbbell  you adjust the weight by adding or subtracting weight plates since i already own several barbelldumbbell weight plates this device was the perfect solution for me

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: fun versatile good price make it as hard as you want
review: this review is from lifeline usa jungle gym xtthe title says it  youll do suspension training because its fun the jungle gym xt is designed to be versatile the price is half of the overhyped main competitor and you can easily vary the exercises to kick your a as much or little as you want something about people makes exercise more fun for us when were moving not the weight the stationary bike wheel whatever with the xt its just fun to swing around and be getting stronger and flexible and be working all your muscle groupls including your core good dvd and sheet included then go online and easily find many dozens of new movements you didnt even know existedthe jungle gym xt itself is well planned and built has better split design than the trx which is twice the price has better footstraps has more durable handgrips has incredibly wellexecuted and quick adjustingcam locks to lengthen and shorten the straps its just a well thoughtout and wellbuilt product  i also bought the lifeline wallmount kit from amazon for  less than the competition and that worked well to mount this to my exposed ceiling joists in the basement its a very good design like the whole systemmy advice buy the jungle gym xt it will motivate you start conservatively make sure your muscles and joints can take it stay safe and then gradually work your way up in difficulty with all muscle groups  including the core and feel free to come up with movements you enjoy thats part of the fun of this apparatusbottom line ive been weight training almost  years getting gradually stuck in a rut and the xt has me excited to be exercising again cant give a much better recommendation than that

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: jungle gym xt
review: overviewthe jungle gym xt is a versitile portable durable piece of equipment it is good for home workouts and can be adapted to work with px style routinesbecause you are working against gravity with your own bodyweight you get a very natural workout that can be very challenging the jungle gym xt could be used on its own for a full body workout but through my experience works best when incorporated into an exercise routine with free weights resistance bands machines and other bodyweight exercisespros  cons of the jungle gym xtproextremely durable  well builtprocompatible with resistance bandsfree weightsbodyweight exercisespxproimproves core strength  overall conditioningprocheaper than other suspension trainers but just as good or betterprofoot loops are more easily accessible than other suspension trainersconportable but not as portable as trx brandcondoes not come with a mounting kit but a door frametreepullup baretc would workthe exercisescore exercises such as knee tucks will work your core better than traditional crunches or sit ups because your legs are suspended as you control your bodies weight in motion or you could plant your feet on the ground and suspended your upper body  for oblique twistsleg exercises such as the  legged lunge or  legged squat are good but you need balance and coordination and a basic level of fitness to perform this is also a good warmup exercise for weight training exercises like squats and leg pressesthe hamstring curl is a good leg exercise that also works your core in addition to your hamstringsback exercises such as rows and pullups work perfectly on the jungle gym xt and the possibilites are endless as you can change your hands position your bodies elevation and the width of the handleschest exercises and dips are difficult on the jungle gym xt because you have to stabilize your body as you press up which is challenging but works the stablilizer muscles well if you cannot do pushups off the ground i would not recommend the jungle gym xt pushups as they are more difficultboth bicep curls and triceps extensions are great on the jungle gym xt the closer you get to the ground the harder the exercise getsshoulder pulls and rear deltoid lateral raises on the jungle gym xt are good exercises but i prefer resistance bands and dumbbells as it feels more natural if you can work up to hand stand pushups this is a serious shoulder building exercise but is not for the novice exerciserin conclusionthe jungle gym xt on its own can get old quickly if you use it regularly on its own but when used in conjunction with other forms of exercise such as resistance training  cardio the jungle gym xt is a great way to enhance or add to a preexisting workout if you are just getting into fitness i would recommend purchasing resistance bands or dumbbells first as the skill level for the jungle gym xt is a little higher and the number of exercises that can be done with bands and dumbbells is a little more comprehensive

title: we did go on vacation camping all summer and were disappointed because it soo hard finding a good anchor point
review: just wow  i got scared buying trx online because of all the fakes but i read on this one i live it we have a smith machine with bench and poulies we put those on the bar of the smith machine we have used it on doors but i feel that our hinges are not enough to handle our weight we did go on vacation camping all summer and were disappointed because it soo hard finding a good anchor point the trx probably beats this because it does not need to have parallel locations its one anchor point so not really if you are in the woods in the city easy  any park will do  i do love the ease of use i did hate that no instructions other then a poster reallly  i bought the trx app and did not regret it so for the price i love it  does it work umm yes  but not for befinners if u have no core strength at all be careful of some positions were u will bend overbend your back or stretch wrong ways its easy to lose balance if u use the trx app start level one and stay there all the way  but this is true for any exercise using belts  so all in all excellent buy as serious as trx but way cheaper love the quality and feel  good buy

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: great for the price overall
review: i bought this instead of the trx which i use at our gym when it is available  i didnt really want to pay the higher price for the trx and also saw some positive reviews here and there for this  like most things there are some pluses and minuses with thison the plus side is the ability to spread the straps wide on the bar for different attack angles  the handles are comfortable and the solid u shaped section makes getting your feet in and out a lot easier  like the trx adjustments of length are quick  it does all the same functions as the trx so the workout is equalon the minus are first the straps have no identifying markings to set the length to so it isnt always exactly the same  if youre not anal simply moving your body off to one side or the other just slightly evens out things as far as your hand position  its not exactly rocket science to get it close so that youre not directly under one and the other is at a  to you  but since i like convenience i laid them on the garage floor fully extended and used a template to spray paint small dots every foot and that works perfect and wasnt hard to do  the second was that unlike the trx that has a nice little looped thing to slide along and hold the excess strap not needed for tension this does not have a nice system of what to do with the excess strap from dangling  it really isnt horrible as far as in the way when it dangles  the rubbery slide clips they give you dont work well at all and make it worse  i just bought  little plastic clipon clamps the black ones with red rubber clip you squeeze together with your finger tips and after i adjust the length i just clip it up as high as i can to hold the excess and all is wellbut considering i paid about  the price of a trx i consider this a better overall system that works great in my basement  i love the quick simple and yet effective workout i can do with it  it is a nice supplement to rest of my strength training with minimal equipment required  just move the feet positioning and change the resistance  the wall chart is crappy but theres a ton of online videos that are excellent

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: useful
review: very usefuldoes not replace the gym but very useful for a home workoutsolid and well made i prefer this one to the brand that they have at the gym

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: love using my personal trainers and wanted one of my own
review: use this at my personal trainers studio and just had to buy one for my home workout space love it  appreciate that you can move the straps close together or to shoulder width apart or further to vary the exercises even more

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: very versatile great core workout
review: i went back and forth deciding between a trx and the jungle gym and the reviewsratings on amazon and other sites pointed pretty directly at jungle gym  the independent mounting of each strap allows for multiple positions and since i mounted mine on a pull up bar keeps them out of the way  adjustment clips are very secure and easy to match lengths on each strap  i didnt rate durability as i have only been using them for  months but they seem to be pretty bulletproof  i am most happy though with the core workout while working muscle groups  push ups in the handles or lunges with a foot in the strap is an eye opener on how much work body weight only exercises can be  do yourself a favor and buy this even as just an addition to your other tools

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: awesomebetter than trx
review: i was looking for a less expensive option to trx i was a little apprehensive but i am very happy i went for this one its not only cheaper but i like it much more it is extremely well made easier to adjust than trx and more versatile they can easily set up in just about any doorway chin up bar playground equipment or just about anywhere the foot straps are great and easy to use because they stay open  im  lbs and this will support my full weight on a single strapthe only conthe only minor thing i dont like is while using the connector piece to use the  straps as one to throw over a tree branch or soemthing similar while doing this you cant pull on individual straps they need to both be used at the same time something can definitely be rigged up to make it work but it doesnt come with anything this can be done with trx but overall this system is more versatile and easier to useif youve never done suspension training its a great supplement to your routine or a good workout you can bring anywhere i usually workout at a gym but i still use these regularly they are also a must while traveling

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: jungle gym xt
review: i tried using the trx system at a gym loved the concept and wanted to get one for my home gym the trx system cost was double of the jungle gym and not as flexible either i can use it as the trx is used one attachment point or i can open it up wide to hit muscles differently just as easy to adjust all the same exercises and more great product

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: be careful if trying full suspension  easy to accidentally unfasten
review: cable slipped through the clasp on first use this is because the cable release lever is easy to accidentally press if youre in a dip position  have the cable close to an adjacent object like your arm or a wall imo the lever should be much more recessed to avoid this

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: your door will be okay
review: its somewhat surprising that something so simple can cost more than  but the quality of the product is high this is a fun way to get exercise if you like dangling and swinging around a bit like me i do not use any kind of wall anchor or freestanding apparatus i simply anchor this to the top of the door as advertised i was skeptical thinking that i would hear something cracking and have to have a long awkward conversation with my landlord about what i was doing with the door thankfully everything is fine its quite surprising actually using these for  degree pullups is my favorite movement and adjusting the length is so fast that its almost instant the buckle mechanism is fantastic if this looks like something you would use i would recommend it no wallmounting or anything fancy required just a door that opens away from you

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: cant go wrong with the lifeline jungle gym xt
review: this is a great product  ive used the trx system and prefer the lifeline jungle gym xt  it is more versatile since the straps arent connected  it is also easier to slip your feet into the foot cradles  the straps also feel more solid on the jungle gym system and the inline adjustment buckles are easier to use than the trx system  i used this while on vacation in waikiki i found some pull up bars at fort derussy that i attached jungle gym xt to and ran through various exercises  prior to my vacation i tried the jungle gym xt using a room door and the entry door to the garage  the system and door help up very well  i was initially skeptical that you could use this system on the lighter doors  they use for bedroom but it held up very well to get the most of your jungle gym xt i would recommend a pull up bar mount or ceiling mount when using these  some of the exercises work better if you are right under the straps also gives you additional resistance  for the price and the versatility you are better off with this system than the trx system

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: please remake this with more versatile rotating handles update simple mod can fix the rotating issue but do so with caution
review: update still using the jungle gym and its pretty much brand new definitely top notch construction noticed my original review was unnecessarily long so heres a quick summary of basically everything i mentionedshort versionprosdevice is much better value than overpriced trxstudy constructiondual anchor system is actually better than single anchor imo plus you can make it a single with the attachment or bringing the straps closer together so it gives the best of both worldsconshandle is very stiff and doesnt rotate like trxif you use dry erase markers try rotating the cap around the handles are basically like that out of the box tight fitting plastic on plasticthis limits ability to do some exercises to full range of motion like reverse flys bicep curls at least for me idk maybe im using it wrongminor nitpicking handle has no lateral or side to side play like trx bc of foot cradles trx has no foot cradles so nylon webbing moves through handle freely from side to side see pictures of both if this doesnt make senseeasy fix pop out the handle and  sand down the inner pipe dont oversand or itll pop out too easilybottomline i would buy it again simply bc the trx is so overpriced  but apart from that this device is good on its own merits and its really well built plus any minor issues can be fixed very easily  grit sand paper or sandinng blockoriginal review aka long versionfor the price and compared to the trx it is a good buy my only complaint is that i would prefer if they made the handles freely rotate so you can use the device more easily when doing reverse flys supermans and other exercises which benefit from a rotating handle it just feels awkward when you are doing reverse fly exercise and the handle doesnt rotate with you which could encourage you to unnaturally curl your wrist when you reach the end range of that motion although to be technically accurate they do rotate as it is just an inner and outer plastic pipe its just not smooth enough to be functional think extremely tight fitting plastic on plastic smoothly rotating handles would be nice for doing preacher curls or other bicep curling exercises which are really not feasible with the fixed handles on the lifeline granted you can modify the product by popping off the sides of each handle which are part of the foot cradle and perhaps sandpolish it down and use a plastic safe grease like white lithium or silicone tried just the grease by itself but you need more clearance between the outer and inner tubes hence the sandingthe other two things i wish they could have done was to make it possible to adjust the angle of the handles what i mean by this is that if you look at the typical workout handle such as the trx they are just a piece of foam wrapped pvc pipe with nylon webbing running through it so you can move the handle laterally the lifeline is essentially this but after the handles it is locked into place because the webbing passes out the handle and then makes a  deg turn through a narrow channel that is the side of the foot cradle and out a small slit at the end this added friction from the foot cradle assembly keeps the handle from moving side to side or tilting rather  degrees left and right while not applicable to all exercises there are certain ones where it would be nice to have some side to side play however this may have been an engineering compromise due to the need for stable fixed handles in certain exercises plus the incorporation of the foot cradlethis is for those who are new to suspension training like myself the new foot cradle is a good feature but if you are doing ab exercises like mountain climbers you need shoes otherwise the cradle puts uncomfortable stress on your instep or top part of your foot lastly if you plan on using this as a strictly door mounted device ie no pullup bar keep in mind there are certain exercises which you cannot do as effectively such as the mountain climbers since the backwards motion is somewhat blocked by the door preventing full range of motion of course if you are a seasoned suspension trainer than you probably already know thishowever i would still recommend the product as it is far less expensive than the trx and despite the few nit picks here and there it is a very functional deviceupdate i had previously recommended sanding downlubing the inner tube that slides into the handle however after reexamining the handle which i had greased with white lithium i noticed the foot cradle pops out too easily from the handle so the combination of sanding and grease may make it worse as the cradle could potentially pop in and out inadvertently during advancedhigh resistance body weight exercisesupdate i got rid of the grease and very lightly sanded some of the raised nibs  and the handles rotate very well now just dont sand very aggressively sand a little wipe clean and check the fit to make sure it has just enough friction for it to rotate without popping out if you sand too much i would advise against using a dremelyou could end up having the sides pop out on certain exercises maybe use  grit to start off and smooth it down with  grit sanding block would be easier than sand paper since it is round so you would have to awkwardly wrap a piece of sandpaper around the male end of the handle and try to shimmy the sandpaper around its cylindrical frame its doable but a little frustrating the only thing i wish for now is if it has more side to side play  also the instep issue with the foot cradle i mentioned earlier doesnt bother me as much now so it may be a temporary thing once your body acclimates anyway on a legal note these are just my observationsi am not suggesting or promoting that anyone actually does this to their handles it just so happens that this particular modification enhances the products functionality for my own uses please  consult the manufacturer as they may have a more appropriate resolution for your particular issue

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: best trx tool for home training
review: i recently hurt myself and had to get these to assist me with getting ready for the gym experience this is the best product i have purchased this year for fitness i know i will see a major difference in  months

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: even better than trx
review: i own the trx suspension trainer and i love this lifeline suspension trainer even better the lifeline suspension trainer has split anchors which allows me to position the straps much wider this wider positioning allows me to do widegrip inverted rows which are fantastic for building strength in my back the trx suspension trainer only has a single anchor point which does not allow me to widegrip inverted rows other than that the trx straps are just as good as the lifeline straps however i do think the trx straps are a cooler looking color bright yellow like the sun than the lifeline straps stop sign red thats just my opinion

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: hard to beat at the price
review: i own this and a trx  my biggest complaint with the trx is how it has about  inches of play right to left side    while this is done in order to make it easier not to be perfectly  symmetrical when you setup before an exercise that is not worth the downsides in my mind  the biggest downside of trx is switching to single handle  is it that hard    not really    but it seems a waste to do it that way and if you are doing something like consecutive different moves on with tabata timing it is a huge pain in the rearthe footstrap part of the handle makes most foot based moves so much better  i say most as lets say you are doing normal planks and then quickly switching to reverse planks with the trx you swing a foot over the other and your feet rotate in the handles  this does not work very well on xt  this minor downside is not that big of a deal and the upside is huge  way too many times i waste time with my foot getting into bad spots with the trx    and spending so much effort focusing on the foot and not the actual exercisethis is also much cheaperit does not feel as well built as trx  the part of the handle that rotates does not rotate nearly as well as trx  the buckles and strap of the trx feel better made    but in reality nylon straps that are  can tow a car  i have no fear either model would breaki do most all my suspension training with a single anchor as i have mounted one on my basement ceiling  the connectors for the xt require a big loop to go through which will be a problem for some anchors  i do not feel the need to mount a second anchor to do some of the mid or wide stuff with the xt  to me one of the biggest upsides of suspension training is the stability needed due to single anchor  moving these straps out to shoulder width apart and doing push ups seems less efficient

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: useful for travellers
review: the lifelineusa xt jungle gym is a very high quality product built of extremely good materials i bought it primarily for use while travelling and for this it is very good the integrated door anchors are sturdy and rubber coated so they do not scratch two separate arms allow for use similar to other suspension trainers single point of suspension or wider suspension points which i find provides better workout flexibility the integrated foot loops are very easy to use compared to other suspension trainers they do however make it more difficult to pack the product into a suitcase as they do not fold flatthe tree branch extension was something i did not appreciate at first until i stayed in a hotel during very nice weather and was able to use their parklike back garden to work out  made for a very nice change of environment from the usual hotel room or gym i suppose this could also be done with some of the other suspension trainersoverall i give it an  out of  in terms of usability practicality the only reason it does not get a  from me is its relative bulky size compared to something like the trx trainer which folds up into a very small bag but which offers only the single point suspension option the variety of exercises that can be done using this product are quite wide the only limitation is the space available in a hotel room  as the only door that is suitable to provide sufficient space is the front door and this is often in a very cramped space that does not allow you to do many of the exercises i have often used it in the hotel gym attaching it to a pullup bar or even a weight machine support structureusing it with a hotel room front door does require some care  its best and most stable when the anchors can be used from the opposite side of the doors opening direction so your weight is suspended by the entire frame of the door using it in the other direction means that there is only the door lock suspending your weight i recommend using a chair to block up the handle and provide additional support and extending the arms to provide sufficient space for performing the exercises

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: a different take on the suspension trainer
review: i bought this as i wanted a suspension trainer and didnt want to spend twice as much for a trx  id never seen one in the flesh and now that ive had it for a while i can give some thoughts about the differencesi didnt see it at the time but the loops of this model are solid for some reason i through theyd be cloth like the trx  they are not  now this isnt a bad thing in a lot of ways  the large loops that you can see are made of a solid plastic so you can slip your feet into them really easily  the downside is that i find them quite heavy  i was intending on travelling with this unit but frankly its too heavy and bulkyi dont have a trx to physically compare it with but i can see that a trx really was designed for travelling  lifeline has tried to put in all the extras that trx makes you pay for ie both straps have integral large chunks of plastic which you use as stoppers when you slip the handles over the top of a door and close it  trx makes you pay for that as an optional extra  what i see trx has is a great unit for travelling  having it at one unit with that large strap that you can wrap around just about anything and secure with the carabiner is frankly a better solution for that  and its more compactdoes this mean i dont like the xt  not at all it just doesnt suit some types of usage for the way i currently use it ie at home in my garage its perfect it has all the features of the trx at half the price  if i was to travel with it as the primary motivation i would have been disappointed as it would have been too heavy in my opinionif youre looking for a quality home suspension trainer that can do anything a trx can at half the price this definitely suits  if youre looking for a portable workout solution that packs small and light and can be easily put around just about anything i would go with the trx

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: wonderful for exercise
review: easy to use great help for strengthening arms  legs and losing weight

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: make sure you can use it properly
review: this is an updated edited version of my original reviewmy wife and i had been looking to add suspension training to our workout routine and after reading reviews of the xt and the trx we decided on the xt  before buying we had a major concern about using the product on a door  in the fitness center in our apartment building the only available doors open into the room as opposed to closing into the door frame  we were unsure whether the xt could be used safely on this side of the door or whether our body weight would pull the door open and wed fall on our faces  i went on lifeline usas website the maker of the xt couldnt find an answer in the faqs so sent an email to their info address  long story short which is that what i was told by the company that the xt can be used on either side of the door was in direct contradiction to whats written in the directions that come with the product which is never use on the side of the door that opens toward you  since i bought the product based on what i was told originally it was basically a waste of time and effort to buy it only to find out that i couldnt use it the way i intendedthis is newi contacted the person who made the original recommendation and he was very apologetic and accommodating with returning the product directly to lifeline so i wouldnt have to incur return shipping which i would if i returned to amazon  my wife and i are disappointed since we were looking forward to using the xt but we dont want to risk our safety by attempting to use it in a way that wasnt intended  it looks like a well made product so ill change my original poed one star rating to three because of the help with the return  for future prospective xt purchasers just make sure youre going to use it the way its supposed to be used which is on the outside of a door so your weight would pull the door into the frame and not potentially pulling the door open and causing you to fall

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: these are nice but get the trx model
review: these have two separate straps i bought this because the price was low however when trx puts theirs on sale their pricing is good  trx makes a better unit in my opinion  easier to use since theirs is one connection to the door or wallceiling mount vs two separate connections with jungle gym

prod_name: lifeline jungle gym suspension trainer
title: generally a good product but
review: i can corroborate what other reviewers have already said i love everything about this product except the red rubberized silicon grips that are meant to hold up the slack line after just two weeks of daily use both grips softened and stretched and stopped doing their job completely they just fall down now leaving big loops of strap that kind of get in the way and make adjusting the strap length between exercises somewhat clunky and frustrating so yeah three star rating if you dont think the issue i described will bother you then consider this a star product and a spaceefficient option for a genuinely challenging strengthbuilding home gymdo take a walk around your home and assess where you could put it up and have room to workout in my home there was no door that met safety specifications and had enough room so we installed heavy duty ceiling brackets in a spot that was better suited to our needs that has worked great for us aside from the grips wearing out

prod_name: balancefrom ab mat trainer abdominal machine
title: correcto
review: balancefrom ab mat trainer reviewthe balancefrom ab mat trainer is a welldesigned and effective exercise tool for targeting the abdominal muscles heres a comprehensive review of this abdominal machine design and build quality the ab mat trainer is wellconstructed with highquality materials providing stability and durability during workouts its ergonomic design ensures proper support for the lower back making it comfortable to use for extended periods functionality this exercise crunch roller effectively isolates and engages the abdominal muscles allowing for a focused and efficient workout the roller motion provides a smooth and controlled movement reducing strain on the neck and back ease of use the ab mat trainer is easy to set up and can be used by individuals of varying fitness levels its compact size makes it convenient for home use and easy to store when not in use performance users can expect to experience a challenging but rewarding workout with consistent use of this exerciser the machine effectively targets the entire core aiding in the development of strength and definition in the abdominal region conclusionthe balancefrom ab mat trainer is a commendable addition to any home gym offering an efficient and comfortable means of working the abdominal muscles its solid construction ergonomic design and overall effectiveness make it a valuable tool for individuals seeking to enhance their core strength and definitioni highly recommend the balancefrom ab mat trainer for those looking to step up their abdominal workout routine with a reliable and welldesigned exercise crunch roller

prod_name: balancefrom ab mat trainer abdominal machine
title: great lumbar paddefinitely needs to be broken in though
review: i have stage  spinal deterioration so when i do ab excerices that involve laying flat on my back on the floor i noticed it put some slight strain in my lumbar region  so i decided that a support pad would be a good way to greater range of motion while taking away the straini picked this model as it was one of the cheapest i could find on amazon or anywhere for that matter  while it does give great support the pad is quite stiff  for example when i placed directly in the center of the small of my back the pad was so rigid that it elevated my entire body off of the floor by about  inch or so  this then made doing ab exercises almost impossible as im still developing my ab strength  so i had to play around with the positioning to find the right comfort level  after repeated use the seems to breaking in now although it is still a bit stiffthis was the only thing preventing me from giving it  stars  that being said considering the price point this is still a very well made ab pad  not disappointed at all

prod_name: yes4all ab exercise mat with tailbone protecting pad
title: sturdy and effective  a solid addition to home workouts
review: i recently purchased the yesall ab mat and after several weeks of regular use i am confident in awarding it four stars this piece of equipment has become a key part of my home workout routine especially for strengthening my coreone of the standout features of this ab mat is its ergonomic design the mat comfortably supports my lower back allowing me to focus on my abs without the discomfort that can come from floor exercises whether i use the version with tailbone support or without depending on my days workout i appreciate its versatilitythe handle is another thoughtful addition its not just about the convenience of carrying the mat around but it also aids in maintaining proper form during exercises this feature is a big plus for someone keen on perfecting situps and other core exercisesin terms of durability the yesall ab mat holds up well its made of sturdy materials that have so far shown no signs of wear and tear despite regular use this durability assures me that it will be a part of my fitness gear for a long timehowever theres room for improvement while the mat is generally comfortable ive noticed it can be stiff during longer workout sessions more cushioning might make it more comfortable for extended usein conclusion the yesall ab mat is a valuable tool for anyone looking to enhance their core workouts at home its ergonomic design sturdy build and helpful handle make it a practical and effective choice im happy to give it a solid four stars and recommend it to others seeking to strengthen their core muscles

prod_name: yes4all ab exercise mat with tailbone protecting pad
title: wow exactly what i wanted
review: well i took a chance on this based on some reviews and the reasonable price i bought one of those bars that you attach to the bottom of the door to hold your feet while doing situps situps have begun to hurt my tailbone if im just on bare floor or carpet so i ordered this to try to address that i wasnt expecting too much wow its perfect enough that it motivated me to write a review first it folds in half making it easier to stick somewhere out of the way when youre not using it second i couldnt really feel any pressure on my tailbone and im a bigger guy much more support than a rubber foldup yoga mat all i had to think about was executing the moves not trying to avoid hurting my tailbone alsoas a side benefit i know fitness gurus have moved away from situps and more toward crunches the hump on this pad fits to the small of ones back and encourages you to stay maybe a hands width off the floor but you can lie down on it if you wanted your shoulders to touch the floor anyway as i did that my lower back cracked in a fantastic waylike a satisfying stretch i sit at a desk and this was a great feel for my lower back which is not the easiest thing to crack or stretch

title: great cheap telescope mount counterweights
review: i bought these as a cheap counterweight for an ioptron cem i bought an inexepensive carbide hole saw and chucked in a cheap wen drill press all from amazon cast iron is easy to work but very messy swarf gets everywhereive tried other brands of cheap weights but these are close to having parallel faces so that they fit together with no gapshighly recommended as counterweights probably ok too for bar weights

prod_name: yes4all-1-inch-weight-plates-dumbbells
title: fine but may need to expand holes
review: i got these weights to use with a set of yesall dumbbells pn dlz i purchased about  months prior i needed just a bit more weight than the  lbs that came with the dumbbell sets for some exercises since these were advertised as  weights and so i thought were the ones that came with the dumbbell sets and since they are from the same company i assumed they would fit on the dumbbell bars just fine as youve likely guessed by now they did not i had to ream out approximately mm of material from the holes in these plates for them to fit on the bars for other standard  bars this may not be an issue but its definitely the case for the yesall dumbbell barsultimately it was a minor inconvenience for me it took about  min per weight with a dremel and carbide bit to ream out the holes so that they would fit however many people probably dont have those kinds of tools at their disposal so figured id give a headsupother than that issue the weights are just fine and were the least expensive i could find on amazon

review: ive been slowly building a mini home gym for those days i cant make it to my gym  ive ordered a few of the yesall weight plates these are perfect for the  inch adjustable dumbbells and  inch ez curl bar  they are true to the weight advertised and are durable  i recently ordered  combos of  plates but my order was incomplete upon delivery and i was missing  plates  i contacted yesall customer service to explain my situation and provided my invoice number and a photo of the items i actually received  the yesall customer service team is top notch  i contacted them via email on a friday afternoon and by sunday morning they shipped me  replacement plates to finally complete my order  i thank yesall for the amazing customer service and outstanding product  it great to know that there are still companies out there that value their customers  i highly recommend this company and their products if your looking to invest in some home gym equipment

title: well made  comfortable set of dumbbells
review: i purchased the portzon set of x  lbs neoprene dumbbells in blue to replace a pair i lent to my niece at the beginning of the pandemic at this point i decided to just buy these for me to use so she could keep the othersi primarily use these after my warmup throwing punches light swings  flys to get my shoulders  back ready for strength trainingthe dumbbells arrived on time  wout issue there were no noticeable defects or damage to the neoprene coating the coating does have a comfortable nonslip texture the quality seems to be right on par wthe other varies manufactured lightweight neoprene coated dumbbells i own these would be fine for all sizes of hands if you have smaller hands you will be able to grip  hold on to the dumbbells securely  comfortablythank you for taking the time to read my review i hope you found it helpful
